story:
-

About Eden - Eden - Universe & Survival Rules

( Version Française de cette page ici)

For 3 years now, the post apocalyptic skirmishes game "Eden" has been played by hundreds of enthusiasts gamers.

From the feedbacks we have got since the beginning, we can proudly say that this tactical, fast and easy gaming system is one of the best skirmishes game around...

However one problem remained :  so far we hadn't found the time to gather and formalize the background elements.

We still needed to lay on paper the history of the world that stand beyond the design of this game universe and characters

This problem is almost solved !

The creator of the Eden universe, lead art director and initiator of the project, Mohamed Ait Mehdi, (A.K.A. Mohand on the international miniature gaming scene ) has a great news for those longing to know what is behind this apocalyptic world !

With the help of many talented writers and graphic artists, Mohand brought to life a 150 pages book. You will find inside 100 pages of background and  an augmented version of the rules.

You will learn the history of this devastated world, the horrors that led to the apocalypse and how the factions played in the game emerged from the ashes of the civilisation

Beside, the rule section of the book will include :

  • clearer writing of the core rule system
  • new sceneries management rules
  • and a brand new exciting feature : the multi player mode that will allow you to fight against up to 3 other opponents !

Why do we need your help ?

Basically to cover the printing (for both English and French versions) and translation costs of the initial batch of books.

- The original english version of the rules will get an new professional translation and rewriting -

But many artists have worked on this project, and will also be rewarded by your funding.

Beyond the initial funding needs, we will also be able to release exclusive gaming material to allow the contributors to get the best of this project.

Book Features

  • 152 pages
  • Full colour
  • Hardcover
  • 100 pages of background and original illustrations
  • 50 pages or game rules - 3rd edition!!
  • new game features : revisited scenery management
  • multi player support (up to 4 players)

 

Game Features

  • A real skirmish game, fast-paced, bloody and tactical.
  • Compact format : 3-6 miniatures per player, one-hour games on a 2’x2’ battlefield.
  • A system of different missions for each player, making every single match a new experience.
  • Open army lists with the possibility to create unusual compositions and nine resulting gameplay experiences.
  • Short rules, easy to learn but hard to master.
  • Tactical cards, influencing the action every turn and establishing a strategy before the battle via a deck building system.
  • Wounds location affecting the fighters’ performances.
  • Top quality pewter miniatures, sculpted by awards winning artists.
  • An original background, mysterious yet classic.
  • Optional rules taking into account all the parameters of a real battle (weather, scenery, unpredictable events, wild beasts, etc).

 

Eden in figures

  • 6 months of testing to design the game and more than 50 games for each additional wave to ensure the balance of the game.
  • 100+ retailers worldwide and new commercial partners every month.
  • A range of 140 models with 4-5 new miniatures each month.
  • 7 factions and a height under development for late 2012.
  • 5 tournaments per month in France.
  • All the gaming material available in 4 different languages.

 

 

 
Wasteland Peeble : get an 15*10cm lithograph of the art cover signed by the artist +
one of the following special edition resin miniature, limited to the Indiegogo subscriptors :
 
  • Exclusive Askari Warrior
  • Bastonne, convoy female fighter
  • Doc Legend
  • Marshall
 
Free Shipping Worldwide !
 
 
My Goodness ! : pick up 2 resin goodies or bonus miniatures among the unlocked ones (list below)!
 
  • Askari Warrior - Goodie 1
  • Askari female Warrior - Goodie 3
  • Exclusive Askari Warrior - Bonus 2
  • Panthera - Goodie 6
  • The Wall scenery element
  • The Wild Scenery Element
  • Last Stand Scenery element
  • Nick, convoy Fighter
  • Bastonne, Convoy Fighter
  • Doc Legend, Convoy Fighter
  • Marshall !!!

 

 
(do not forget to drop a comment to inform us abour your selection)
 
Add 5€ for shipping unleast you have allready subscribed a perk of Explorator level or above.
 

EXPLORATOR :
 
Get one of the very fist copy of our book +
 
a special edition resin miniature, limited to this Indiegogo subscriptors
an 15*10cm lithograph of the art cover, signed by the author
 
c.f above for book features
 
Add 5€ for shipping
 
 Egalement disponible en version Française (préciser la langue souhaitée en commentaire ! )
 
 
 
 
 
 
SURVIVOR :
 
What would be the use of a rulebook and gaming universe without miniatures ?
Get the rule book and pick :
 
 
 
the special edition resin miniature, limited to this Indiegogo subscriptors that comes with the book.
 
one of the 7 factions starter boxes of the game EDEN.
 
Each faction has a strong design and an original gameplay :
  • Do you fancy harassment tactics and ranged fights : join the mad JOKERS gangers
  • If you like to play a squad of sturdy specialist, you must be a mutant of the BAMAKA clan
  • Brutish action and expendables slave of war ? Sybille faith will help you to cleanse the world among the sisters of the MATRIARCHY
  • Bring back civilisation to this crude world, protect the settlements of survivors and trade to expand your empire with the CONVOY
  • Always outnumbered, but deadly with their special abilities, the fearless drones of the ISC will please the technology addicts
  • You can also field their worse enemies : the humans from the RESISTANCE, loaded with hi-tech equipments, these deadly warriors will have to manage their energy cell ressources though...
  • At last, pick one of the two HORD booster pack the unleash the savagery of these former human being, now feeding with their minions over the corpses of the survivors !!

Eden being a very compact game, these 100 army point are all that you need to get started !

 

or select 40€ worth of EDEN individual blisters :

click here to download our miniature list, with all the details needed to compose your ideal warband !  (do not forget to tell us which references you would like)

 

The starters and blisters can be packed in the following versions :

     

A 15% discount voucher on Taban Miniatures Webshop

Add 5€ for shipping

 

  

 
APOCALYPSE NOW :
 
 
Survivor +
 
 
a great scenery set, including 9 finely casted elements and one double sided poster offering 2 options of battleground
 
 
Scenery set includes 11 finely casted resin elements and require assembly ; images below of our studio painted version
 
one of the unlocked goodies of your choice 
 
The starters and blisters can be packed in the following versions : 
 
      

A 15% discount voucher on Taban Miniatures Webshop
 
Add 5€ for shipping within the EEU, 7€ anywhere else
 

 
APOCALYPSE NOW :
 
 
Survivor +
 
 
All the following unlocked goodies !
  • Askari Warrior, resin cast with limited edition head and arms
  • Askari Female warrior, resin cast with limited edition head and arms
  • "The Wall" scenery element
  • "The Wild" scenery element
  • "Last stand" scenery element
  • "panthera" limited edition non player fighter, resin casted
 
 
The starters and blisters can be packed in the following versions : 
 
      

Estimated RSP Value 115-120€

A 15% discount voucher on Taban Miniatures Webshop
 
 Add 5€ for shipping within the EEU, 7€ anywhere else
 
 
 

KNIGHT OF THE APOCALYPSE : 

Apocalypse Now +

 a second starter box among the 7 factions starter boxes of the game EDEN ! OR a second batch of individual blisters up to 40€ 

click here to download our miniature list, with all the details needed to compose your ideal warband !  (do not forget to tell us which references you would like)

whether you are unsure about which faction to play, or would like to have anything at hand to fight with your friends when the come home, this perk is designed for you ! 

The starters and blisters can be packed in the following versions : 

      

3 additional unlocked goodies ! (for a total of 4)

Estimated RSP 180-190€

A 15% discount voucher on Taban Miniatures Webshop

Free Shipping Worldwide !

 

 SHADES of APOCALYPSE : Apocalypse Now +

your miniatures painted at tabletop + level by our design studio

 Free Shipping Worldwide !

 

Come get Some : Apocalypse Now +

your miniatures painted at studio level by award winning painter Mohand. (You can see examples of his artworks on this page...)

2 extra unlocked goodies

A 15% discount voucher on Taban Miniatures Webshop

Free Shipping Worldwide !

 

 

GET A FANCY VAULT : Apocalypse Now + 

one of the original artworks of 'Eden - Universe & Survival Rules'

drop us a comment with the name of the handpainted original you want to get :

1 = Ambush,

handpainted by Stéphane Louis, french illustrator and cartoonist (Tesa 42 series among other great comics from S.L !)

2 = Fighting for Escape

handpainted by Stéphane Louis, french illustrator and cartoonist (Tesa 42 series among other great comics from S.L !)

3 = ISC is watching you

Handpainted by Mohamed "Mohand" Ait Mehdi, freelance sculptor and painter, multi golden demon winner (and director/author of the Eden - Universe and survival rules" projet !

Browse this project's galery for larger wiews of these artworks

all of the unlocked goodies !!

A 15% discount voucher on Taban Miniatures Webshop


Free Shipping Worldwide !

 

For easier undestanding of our project's perks, here are 2 overviews of both regular and limited amount perks

 

Regular Perks

(click on picture to enlarge)

 

Limited amount perks

(click on picture to enlarge)

 

Besides the original perk, we would like to reward the contributors if our initial funding need is met and if it raises above this limit !

Each time that we will reach a given Stretch goal, we will invest in a new goodie, most of the time exclusive to this Indiegogo project.

These Add-ons will enhance the gaming experience of the contributors and allow them to play EDEN with style !

The path finder below will show you what we are up to :

 

We made it !!! ....All the four unlocked !

Great support overnight from everybody, that's amazing :-)

Yep, we will sculpt and resin cast "Marshall" (another Convoy fighter and the last of the Indiegogo Road Warriors.), based on the original artwork below (design by Stéphane Louis)

Just like "Bastonne" and "Doc Legend", this miniature will get an "Eden" profile next year, but with a totaly different sculpt. YOUR indiegogo "Marshall" will be really unique...  !

Doc legend, Bastone and Marshall can be acessed through the perk "My Goodness" (2 miniatures pack) , or by subscribing a "Wasteland peeble" perk as an individual miniature.

Huuuge thanks for all the players around the word who have supported this campaign for over one month !.

You guys did a great job ....Our project is fully financed !

Thanks to your help the book is under press and will hit our warehouse next week, but, since this afternoon, we won't even have to knock at Mr. Banker door to ask for the money we needed to cover the remaining costs

"Doc legend" green is on allready on the workbench.

This Convoy fighter is sculpted from the original artwork below (design by Stéphane Louis)

 

Just like "Bastonne" the miniature will get an "Eden" profile next year, but with a totaly different sculpt. YOUR indiegogo "Doc legend" will be really unique... and legendary !

Both Doc legend and Bastone can be acessed through the perk "My Goodness", or the  individual miniature perk "Wasteland Peeble".

Unlocked !

 Thanks again, we are working on the master of this new exclusive miniatures
...

Pictures will be shown next week !

"Bastonne" (another Convoy fighter.)is based on the original artwork below (design by Stéphane Louis)

Bastonne will be available through a new perk, "Wasteland Peeble" like...

Bastonne's game profile will be available in 2013 with a different sculpt of the character: thus you Indiegogo version will be truly unique... and limited !

 

New stretch goal with a seventh goodie !

If we reach 20000€ we will sculpt and cast "Nick" (a new Convoy fighter.), based on the original artwork below (design by Stéphane Louis)

 

Nick will be included in all the aftermath and limited amount perks and can be picked as one of the goodies in the  "Apocalypse Now" and "Knight of the Apocalypse"

Nick's game profile will be available in 2013 with a different sculpt of the character: thus you Indiegogo version will be truly unique... and limited !

 

Don't think that the world of eden is an empty place, with scare bands of survivors.

Many creatures survived and evolved at the surface while the human kind waited underneath...
Some of them now help your fighters as minions or tamed warbeasts, but most of them roam the battlefield and will attack both sides.

PANTHERA  - goodie #6 

To help the players enjoying this other aspect of the optional rules of EDEN you will get an exclusive non player fighter among the goodies :

a fierce panthera crafted by Master sculptor Stéphane N'Guyen :

Bonus #4

Additionaly, all the limited amount perks are updated with ALL the unlocked goodies (and you will get them painted in the case of "Into the legend" !)

 

 

Congratulations survivor, with your friends you managed to survive your first night out of the vault !

This trial has unlocked a new goodie : "The last Stand".

A new resin scenery element, limited to this Indiegogo campaign ! 
One of the new features of "EDEN, universe and Survival rules" will developp further the use of seneries and landscape elements as optional rules : you will be able to hide, get cover, climb, set in flames, explode, jump over them etc...

But beware, some of them can be radioactive or even be the den of some fierce creatures !

Last Stand - goodie #5

 

BONUS #3

All the lucky subscriptors of "Knight of the apocalypse" also get 2 extra goodies choices (for a total of 4 !

 

Thanks a lot, we made it !

Your massive support allows us to press on the "print" button, Santa is coming to Town soon !

Mohand has started to sculpt the Indiegogo exclusive miniature.
and ALL the contributors will recieve a resin copy 

original concept art designed by Bertrand Benoit :

BONUS #2

 

For the unlocked goodies :

  • an Askari female Warrior (concept also by Bertrand Benoit) that will also differ from the final starter version : both head and arms will be specific to this Indiegogo project...
  • and a second scenery element "The Wild", sculpted by Remi Bostal

ASKARI FEMALE WARRIOR - goodie #3

The picture above shows both indiegogo exclusive goodie version (on the left) and the regular starter box version that will be released mid-december (right model). Note that our incoming starter will include 2 other choices of head and arms for this female fighter, all compatible with you indiegogo version !

THE WILD - goodie #4

 

LOOT THE VAULT SAFE : We made is ! Thanks to our contributors we are half way to get funded...

The vault safe is open and the wasteland lays beyond !

So, what was the content of this first strech goal ? One goodie ?
 
NO Survivors .... A DOUBLE goodie and a bonus !
 
You have unlocked  :
  • a great resin scenery element " The Wall", sculpted by Remi Bostal, that will only be available on this Indiegogo !
  • a resin cast of a fighter from our upcoming EDEN faction, the ASKARIS
  • Although the miniature is scheduled in the December starter Box, this version will get a set of arms, weapon and head exclusively sculpted for indiegogo !
  • BONUS #1 : a Bonus Voucher, that will grant all the contributors of perks "Survivor" and above, a 15% discount on Taban Miniatures webshop ! A great oportunity for those who will get into our game and follow the waves of releases

ASKARI WARRIOR - goodie #1

 

We have finished to sculpt the first unlocked Askari fighter !
The picture above shows both indiegogo exclusive goodie version (on the left) and the regular starter box version that will be released mid-december (right model). Note that our incoming starter will include 4 choices of head and arms, all compatible with you indiegogo version !

THE WALL - goodie #2

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Stay tuned and spread the word !

Apocalypse is getting close, we all need to get prepared !

 FAQ

We got many questions in the comments, or by e-mail... here are the answers to the most common ones :

Q1 - I have forgotten to add the shipping cost to my perk value ! How to resolve this problem ?

A : we will contact all the contributors to check their shipping adress, the starters , blisters or goodies they want + remind them, if necessary to pay for shipping

Q2 :Can I update my perk level ?

A : Yes. After your initial contribution, Yes you can select, for instance, "Wasteland peeble" and contribute for the complement.

Do not forget to drop a comment to inform us. At any case, we will spot this unusual amoiunt and contact you for details

Q3 - I don't understand what are the individual goodies unlocked so far !

A : we have unlocked 2 kind of things : the goodies and the bonuses.

Goodies : 1 askari warrior, the wall resin scenery, 1 Askari female Warrior, the wild resin scenery, last stande scenery, 1 panthera miniature !

For some perks you will have to pick one or several goodies, for others you will get them all !

Bonuses :

  • the exclusive Askari warrior : it will be sent to all the contributors excepted "My Goodness" ones
  • a Taban Miniatures -15% voucher : it will be included in all the  Explorator perks and above (and will replace your eventual fidelity discount)

Q4 - Which Eden miniatures and starters are available through the perks ?

A : All the references released up to October 2012. Check the downloadable list for details : here

 

Q5 - Can I subscribe to several perks, and what about combined shipping ?

A : Yes, most welcome ! For those who  :

  • allready have subscribed perks "Knight of the apocalypse" and above, no extra shipping cost is needed, whatever the additional perks
  • have only subscribed "Wasteland peeble" : add shipping costs if required
  • have allready paid for shipping costs : no extra shipping is needed

Q6 - Can I downgrade my contribution

A : No :-(

Q7 - I want to swap the rule book for something else, is it possible ?

No, if you want the goodies only, use "Wasteland Peeble" or "My Goodness".

If you just want Eden miniatures, go to Taban's webshop or visit your local retailer ;-)

About Eden - Eden - Universe & Survival Rules
( Version Française de cette page ici)
For 3 years now, the post apocalyptic skirmishes game "Eden" has been played by hundreds of enthusiasts gamers.
From the feedbacks we have got since the beginning, we can proudly say that this tactical, fast and easy gaming system is one of the best skirmishes game around...
However one problem remained :  so far we hadn't found the time to gather and formalize the background elements.
We still needed to lay on paper the history of the world that stand beyond the design of this game universe and characters
This problem is almost solved !
The creator of the Eden universe, lead art director and initiator of the project, Mohamed Ait Mehdi, (A.K.A. Mohand on the international miniature gaming scene ) has a great news for those longing to know what is behind this apocalyptic world !
With the help of many talented writers and graphic artists, Mohand brought to life a 150 pages book. You will find inside 100 pages of background and  an augmented version of the rules.
You will learn the history of this devastated world, the horrors that led to the apocalypse and how the factions played in the game emerged from the ashes of the civilisation

clearer writing of the core rule system
new sceneries management rules
and a brand new exciting feature : the multi player mode that will allow you to fight against up to 3 other opponents !



Why do we need your help ?

Basically to cover the printing (for both English and French versions) and translation costs of the initial batch of books.

But many artists have worked on this project, and will also be rewarded by your funding.

6 months of testing to design the game and more than 50 games for each additional wave to ensure the balance of the game.

All the gaming material available in 4 different languages.

Nick's game profile will be available in 2013 with a different sculpt of the character: thus you Indiegogo version will be truly unique... and limited !
 

Don't think that the world of eden is an empty place, with scare bands of survivors.
Many creatures survived and evolved at the surface while the human kind waited underneath... Some of them now help your fighters as minions or tamed warbeasts, but most of them roam the battlefield and will attack both sides.PANTHERA  - goodie #6 
To help the players enjoying this other aspect of the optional rules of EDEN you will get an exclusive non player fighter among the goodies :
a fierce panthera crafted by Master sculptor Stéphane N'Guyen :

Bonus #4
Additionaly, all the limited amount perks are updated with ALL the unlocked goodies (and you will get them painted in the case of "Into the legend" !)
 


 
Congratulations survivor, with your friends you managed to survive your first night out of the vault !
This trial has unlocked a new goodie : "The last Stand".A new resin scenery element, limited to this Indiegogo campaign ! One of the new features of "EDEN, universe and Survival rules" will developp further the use of seneries and landscape elements as optional rules : you will be able to hide, get cover, climb, set in flames, explode, jump over them etc...
But beware, some of them can be radioactive or even be the den of some fierce creatures !
Last Stand  - goodie #5

 
BONUS #3
All the lucky subscriptors of "Knight of the apocalypse" also get 2 extra goodies choices (for a total of 4 !
 


Thanks a lot, we made it !
Your massive support allows us to press on the "print" button, Santa is coming to Town soon !
Mohand has started to sculpt the Indiegogo exclusive miniature.and ALL the contributors will recieve a resin copy 
original concept art designed by Bertrand Benoit :
BONUS #2


 


For the unlocked goodies :

an Askari female Warrior (concept also by Bertrand Benoit) that will also differ from the final starter version : both head and arms will be specific to this Indiegogo project...
and a second scenery element "The Wild", sculpted by Remi Bostal

ASKARI FEMALE WARRIOR  - goodie #3


The picture above shows both indiegogo exclusive goodie version (on the left) and the regular starter box version that will be released mid-december (right model). Note that our incoming starter will include 2 other choices of head and arms for this female fighter, all compatible with you indiegogo version !
THE WILD  - goodie #4


 


LOOT THE VAULT SAFE : We made is ! Thanks to our contributors we are half way to get funded...
The vault safe is open and the wasteland lays beyond !
So, what was the content of this first strech goal ? One goodie ?
 
NO Survivors .... A DOUBLE goodie and a bonus !
 
You have unlocked  :


a great resin scenery element " The Wall", sculpted by Remi Bostal, that will only be available on this Indiegogo !
a resin cast of a fighter from our upcoming EDEN faction, the ASKARIS
Although the miniature is scheduled in the December starter Box, this version will get a set of arms, weapon and head exclusively sculpted for indiegogo !

BONUS #1 : a Bonus Voucher, that will grant all the contributors of perks "Survivor" and above, a 15% discount on Taban Miniatures webshop ! A great oportunity for those who will get into our game and follow the waves of releases

ASKARI WARRIOR - goodie #1


 
We have finished to sculpt the first unlocked Askari fighter !The picture above shows both indiegogo exclusive goodie version (on the left) and the regular starter box version that will be released mid-december (right model). Note that our incoming starter will include 4 choices of head and arms, all compatible with you indiegogo version !
THE WALL  - goodie #2


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Stay tuned and spread the word !
Apocalypse is getting close, we all need to get prepared !

 FAQ
We got many questions in the comments, or by e-mail... here are the answers to the most common ones :
Q1 - I have forgotten to add the shipping cost to my perk value ! How to resolve this problem ?
A : we will contact all the contributors to check their shipping adress, the starters , blisters or goodies they want + remind them, if necessary to pay for shipping
Q2 :Can I update my perk level ?
A : Yes. After your initial contribution, Yes you can select, for instance, "Wasteland peeble" and contribute for the complement.
Do not forget to drop a comment to inform us. At any case, we will spot this unusual amoiunt and contact you for details
Q3 - I don't understand what are the individual goodies unlocked so far !
A : we have unlocked 2 kind of things : the goodies and the bonuses.
Goodies : 1 askari warrior, the wall resin scenery, 1 Askari female Warrior, the wild resin scenery, last stande scenery, 1 panthera miniature !
For some perks you will have to pick one or several goodies, for others you will get them all !
Bonuses :

the exclusive Askari warrior : it will be sent to all the contributors excepted "My Goodness" ones
a Taban Miniatures -15% voucher : it will be included in all the  Explorator perks and above (and will replace your eventual fidelity discount)
Q4 - Which Eden miniatures and starters are available through the perks ?
A : All the references released up to October 2012. Check the downloadable list for details : here
 
Q5 - Can I subscribe to several perks, and what about combined shipping ?
A : Yes, most welcome ! For those who  :

allready have subscribed perks "Knight of the apocalypse" and above, no extra shipping cost is needed, whatever the additional perks
have only subscribed "Wasteland peeble" : add shipping costs if required
have allready paid for shipping costs : no extra shipping is needed
Q6 - Can I downgrade my contribution
A : No :-(
Q7 - I want to swap the rule book for something else, is it possible ?
No, if you want the goodies only, use "Wasteland Peeble" or "My Goodness".
If you just want Eden miniatures, go to Taban's webshop or visit your local retailer ;-)

story:
Anonymysh app would be Totally Anonymous way to share and post on iOS and Android.

No Phone contact, No email, No way for your friends to find you, No any details from any social network, No personal info, No poster location.

Anonymysh app would let you speak freely.  It would give you the way to be true self to express true opinions, beliefs, and ideas without putting your reputation on the line or being judged.

Don't be ever afraid to discuss your thoughts as your personal reputation is not attached.

[Note: All images in description are taken from user interface design template we might use for the app after needed changes. There would be no poster photo thumbnail at all in ANONYMYSH app]

Limits removing features:

Don't be gagged: Debate sensitive topics, raise questions, or share anything.

Don't be heard just locally: Broadcast instead, the more people like your post the more exposure it would get.

Don't let your most important part on message be skimmed through: Use any photo or image  to highlight  the most important part of your message to the world.

Don't limit yourself: no small limit on post length.

Don't drawn in activity feed: Advanced Anonymysh activity feed would show the content the way you decide to see it.

Don't let slow commenting & replying on phone slow you down: Anonymysh would speedy comment tech.

Don't be forced to follow people or friend you "should" follow. Anonymysh gives you the freedom to follow based on content.

Don't let Timeline confuse you: Anonymysh Messages & Photos Timeline would be surprisingly simple but powerful.

Don't miss posts in discussion you participate in. You can choose to enable instant notification of topic you actively discuss.

[Note: First version of ANONYMYSH app would not have video sharing]

Backers get custom nickname of their choice.

After app releases normal user will be able to choose nickname from either 1 word + random number, or 2 words (if 2 words taken then extra number).

Only backers would get chosen nickname and could stand above the described name limits .

Backer nickname can be anything* within reason.

Anonymity for backers: We do not plan to track which backer would get which name. Therefore we would not have information who created which nickname.

For those of you who follow techcrunch.com, there was very good interview with Secret app creators on techcrunch DISRUPT NYC Event May 6th 2014. Interview was very positive and with good energy but Secret app founders did confirm limited anonymity by disclosing the info that Secret app user data are kept and connected to the post on the backend. 

If you are not happy with limited back end anonymity like in Secret or Whisper apps, the Anonymysh is the app for you. 

If you don't want to be named alpha1432, beta4321, and such, the Anonymysh is the app for you. 

If you don't want to be limited to short post on random background image, the Anonymysh is the app for you. 

If you want to use the app which uses custom tech to minimize bullying so you can enjoy self expression fully, the Anonymysh is the app for you.

If you don't want to be part of limited local conversation around you but rather see the bigger picture and access more diverse content, the Anonymysh is the app for you. 

If you don't want your real data to ever land in hacker hands (there would be no real data to steal), the Anonymysh is the app for you.

[Note: There would be no poster photo thumbnail at all in ANONYMYSH app]

Android user interface views

[Note: All images in description are taken from user interface design template we might use for the app after needed changes. There would be no poster photo thumbnail at all in ANONYMYSH app]

* nickname cannot infringe somebody rights, be derogatory, racist, hateful or anything in those directions. There would be limit on nickname length.

story:
Hex Empire is a very successful strategic game with a strong base of loyal but rather stingy fans. That's why the previous campaign (http://www.indiegogo.com/Hex-Empire-3) failed miserably. Now I try again and even give you a Hex Empire based mini-game that mayby will help to encourage you to support Hex Empire 3. You can play it here:
 

Play Hex Empire : Killing by Numbers! 

 
Also you can play the classic Hex Empire 1 (Click here to play now! Opens in new window). It has over 30,000,000 game plays and the number is still raising! Now the time has come for a completely new quality - Hex Empire 3 (working title). It's a project I have been planning for a long time, featuring:
 
  • updated 3D graphics
  • deeper gameplay with good old joyful and easy point-and-click mechanics 
  • campaign mode
  • multiplayer mode
  • custom maps (created by players)
  • desktop and mobile versions
  • and lots more!
 

The Impact

However the project is much bigger than the original Hex Empire and it's hard to make a quality game without proper founding, so I count on your help! Please support Hex Empire 3 development and you'll get your own happy little world to destroy, isn't it what you have always dreamed about? 

 

What We Need & What You Get

There are lots of cost I am facing, among others it's pro version of Unity3D engine + plugins that will allow me to publish the game to iOS and Android. Currently I'm developing the game using indie version that has its severe limitations. Everything, besides music and sound effects (I have to pay for them too!), I'm going to make myself and I want to work full-time on the project so I also need money to pay my bills and not to make my family starve ;).

 

What you get? With as little as 5$ contribution you get lots of fun, a game that you could play over and over again without getting bored. Just read reviews of the original Hex Empire and check it yourself, Hex Empire 3 will be just 16 times better! Also remember that with my 5000$ goal exceeded I will be able to add even cooler new features and get the final product more polished.

With the campaign goal not met the game will be still completed only I will have to cut down on features - it will be simpler and less polished, also it will take a long time to develop without proper founds. Help to make Hex Empire 3 a total WIN!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like to talk a lot just spread the word! Facebook, twitter, share info about this campaign everywhere.

story:
The Hermes Playing Card Oracle is a standard deck of cards that measures 3.5" by 2.5", with 54 cards, including two jokers, on slightly thicker paper. But a divinatory symbol is included on each card.  It is both a collector's deck of playing cards and a divinatory tool. 


MY STORY

I am an artist and a scholar. I am well known as the designer of eleven Tarot decks and three oracle decks, including The Alchemical Tarot. The Tarot of the Sevenfold Mystery, and the Burning Serpent oracle.  (You can see these decks by viewing my previous Indiegogo campaigns.)  I am also a respected scholar on the subjects of divination, mysticism, and the occult. My book, The Tarot: History, Symbolism, and Divination, was recommended as one of the best books ever written on the subject, by the American Library Association, in a review in their periodical, “Booklist.”

In the 1980s, I had a series of visionary experiences that opened my eyes to the connections between alchemy and the Tarot and led me to designing The Alchemical Tarot.  Since then, The Alchemical Tarot has become world famous, (the first edition has been resold for the highest price paid for a modern deck.) I have been invited to cut the ribbon at the grand opening of the Tarot Museum in Riola, Italy, I have curated an exhibition on the history of Tarot at the Craft and Folk Art Museum in LA, I lecture on the history of cards regularly at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, in New York, and one of my decks is included in their collection.


Although at this time most people would associate The Tarot deck with divination and playing card decks with card games, this was not always the case. My research has led me to the realization that all card decks, including the Tarot and four-suit decks, have always been used for both games and divination.  In fact, historically, most diviners were more likely to use a four-suit deck for divination.

In the late 18th century, this trend led to the creation of a plethora of decks that were designed primarily for divination. These decks were called sibilla or oracle decks.  The most popular variation was the 36-card Lenormand deck, named after the most famous diviner of the Napoleonic period, and first published in Germany in 1847.

Each card in an oracle deck depicted an iconic symbolic image and included a small image of the playing card that was meant to relate to the image. Their popularity continued up until the mid 20th century when the re-envisioned occult Tarot deck began to take their place. It was the study of these oracle decks in the Metropolitan Museum collection that led me to a new appreciation of the rich history behind the images on regular playing cards.

For those of you who would like to delve deeper into the history of oracle cards, I recommend my article, The History of Oracle Cards, on my website:

A History of Oracle Cards in Relation to The Burning Serpent Oracle and a New Revelation About the Origin of the Lenormand.)


MY INSPIRATION

I wanted to design a deck of cards that honored these connections, that could be used for both games and divination, and that was designed with an appreciation for the graphic beauty and simplicity of common playing cards. So I have turned the tradition on its head.  I have designed an innovative deck of cards that has oracle symbols added to the cards, a deck that honors both purposes.


This is not my first oracle project.  My first, was a deck that I designed with input from the noted Tarot author Rachel Pollack. It was called The Burning Serpent Oracle.  I designed this deck and Rachel wrote the accompanying book.  With The Hermes Playing Card Oracle I am including a small book that fits in the card box and explains the basics of divination with the deck.  However, if you desire to delve more deeply into the mysteries of divination with the oracle, I recommend reading Rachel’s book.  It comes with the deck that I designed, and I am offering the set together with The Hermes Playing Card Oracle as one of the perks.  


PRODUCTION

The Hermes Playing Card Oracle is now in production at the printers.  It is scheduled to be here by February first, 2016. The minimum goal for this campaign is meant to cover the printing cost, but I will print it whether I reach the goal or not. I guarantee that I will mail out all perks no matter how much this campaign earns.  I am planning on mailing them in February. It is only once the goal is reached, and we go over that amount, that I will begin to earn a profit for my work. $5,000 is only meant to me the minimum goal. So please feel free to order perks even after the goal is reached.  


THE CARDS



PERKS

Here is a list of perks, Perks mailed in the USA are listed separately from international mailings.

$20 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle sent by priority mail in the USA - Shipping $7

$20 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle sent by priority mail anywhere in the world that the US Mail service will deliver - Shipping $25

$30 - One 8.5” by 11” archival print of any card in the deck (or a group of four cards) mailed in the USA, shipping included, (please send your preference at the end of the campaign). 

$40 - Two Hermes Playing Card Oracles sent by Priority mail in the USA - Shipping $7

$40 - Two Hermes Playing Card Oracles sent by priority mail anywhere in the world that the US Mail service will deliver - Shipping $25

$50 - One Hermes Plating Card Oracle and one Ceramic Mug featuring the two Jokers and several symbols, mailed in the USA - Shipping $15

$50 - One Hermes Plating Card Oracle and one Ceramic Mug featuring the four queens, mailed in the USA - Shipping $15

$60 - Three Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed in the USA - Shipping $7

$60 - Three Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed internationally - Shipping $25

$60 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle and one Burning Serpent Oracle deck and book  mailed in the USA - Shipping $7

$60 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle and one Burning Serpent Oracle deck and book  mailed internationally- Shipping $25

$60 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle and both versions of the New York Lenormand, one with Tarot inserts and one with playing card inserts, mailed in the USA - Shipping $7 (See my Indiegogo Campaign for the NY Lenormand for more information.) 

$60 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle and both versions of the New York Lenormand, one with Tarot inserts and one with playing card inserts, mailed Internationally - Shipping $25


$80 - Four Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed in the USA - Shipping $7

$80 - Four Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed internationally - Shipping $25

$80 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle and both versions of the ceramic mug, mailed in the USA - Shipping $20

$100 - Six Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed in the USA - Shipping $15

$100 - Six Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed internationally - Shipping $45

$200 - Twelve Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed in the USA - Shipping $15

$200 - Twelve Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed internationally - Shipping $45


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP 

Finally, help to spread the word. If you have enjoyed reading this, if the project excites you, then please help spread the word.  Even if you do not decide to pre-order the deck at this time, please pass on this announcement any way you can—Facebook, Twitter, email lists, blogs, simple one-on-one communications. There are share tools right on this site.


A DESCRIPTION OF THE DECK FROM THE LITTLE WHITE BOOK 

The Hermes Playing Card Oracle is the latest oracle deck designed by Robert M. Place.  It is a standard game deck of 52 cards plus two jokers, but with the addition of symbolic images on each card, each providing a divinatory meaning. It can be used for card games, or laid out in the traditional pattern, known as the Grand Tableau, and used for divination.


Although the Tarot is the deck that most people today would associate with divination, historically, regular four-suit decks of playing cards were more likely to have been used for this purpose. In the late 18th century, oracle decks were first published in which each card was illustrated with a symbol designed primarily for divination, but a small image of the playing card associated with each symbol was also included on each card. The most popular oracle deck was the Petit Lenormand, first published in Germany in 1847. This deck was based on the common 36-card German deck (a deck without the 2 through 5 pip cards in each suit) and a miniature playing card was included at the top of each card. There were, however, many variations of oracle decks produced in the 19th century, including some based on the standard 52-card French deck.

The Hermes Playing Card Oracle is like a traditional oracle deck, but instead of each card being dominated by a symbolic image, with only a miniature of the associated playing card inserted somewhere on the card, each card is a standard playing card with the symbolic image inserted somewhere on the card. The symbolic images on each card are ones found in traditional oracle decks, and each has a specific meaning.  The ones on the ace, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, and the three royal cards in each suit are the same as in the Lenormand oracle.  If the number 2, 3, 4, and 5 pips of each suit are removed, the deck can function as a standard Lenormand oracle deck. 

The deck can be used for any card game, but when it is used for divination, all of the cards are to be shuffled and laid out in the Grand Tableau pattern.  When the deck is being used as a standard Lenormand, the Grand Tableau will consist of four rows of eight cards, laid out left to right from the top to the bottom row. Then the remaining four cards are to be laid out in a fifth row, centered on the bottom.  When all 54 of the cards in the deck are used, which includes the two Jokers, the Grand Tableau with consist of six rows of nine cards, laid out left to right top row to bottom. 


The most important cards in the reading are the significators. These are the Ace of Spades, representing the subject of the reading if she is a woman, and the Ace of Hearts, representing the subject if he is a man. If the subject is a woman then the Ace of Hearts may represent her love interest, and likewise the Ace of Spades may serve this function for a man. This relationship is strongest when the male and female cards seem to be facing each other. If the subject is a lesbian woman, the Female Joker may serve as the love interest. Likewise, the Male Joker may serve this function for a gay man.  Although traditionally romantic relationships are a major focus for oracle readings, the cards may be used to divine on any subject, and the second significator and the Jokers may be used to represent others, such as friends or relatives.

When reading the spread, first locate the significator and determine which way she or he is facing. The cards in a horizontal or diagonal line extending from the front of the significator (that she or he is facing) represent the future.  The cards extending horizontally or diagonally behind the significator represent the past.  The cards in a vertical line directly above and below the significator represent the present.  Cards below the significator represent issues that have been mastered by the significator and ones above still present a challenge. The cards closest to the significator are the strongest in the their influence and the ones further away are the weakest or most distant in time. 

Also pay attention to images that are facing the significator and therefore moving toward her or him, also ones that are facing away and moving away. Direction is especially important when considering the King of Clubs, with the Cloud on his card. Pay attention to the cloud that appears at the top of the card.  It has a dark negative side and a light positive side. The dark side will weaken or obscure the card next to it. 

There are also layouts with fewer cards, and the cards can be used in any layout recommended for Lenormand cards. To learn more, any good book on Lenormand cards will be helpful, such as The Burning Serpent Oracle by Rachel Pollack. 

The Meanings of the Cards

Ace of Spades – The Woman: the significator if the subject is a woman or the love interest if the subject is a man.

Two of Spades – The Crossed Swords: attack, debate, a difference of opinion.

Three of Spades – The Bee: work, industry, productivity.

Four of Spades – Hermes: speed, protection, insight, guidance, commerce, healing.

Five of Spades – The Lion: courage, strength, discipline.

Six of Spades – The Tower: authority, leadership, solitude.

Seven of Spades – The letter: a message, news, documents.

Eight of Spades – The Garden: community, a gathering, acceptance.

Nine of Spades – The Anchor: stability, hope, virtue.

Ten of Spades – The Ship: a journey, travel, an adventure.

Jack of Spades – The Child: innocence, youth, playfulness.

Queen of Spades – The Bouquet: a gift, appreciation, beauty.

King of Spades – The Lily: sexuality, maturity, purity.

Ace of Hearts – The Man: the significator if the subject is a man or the love interest if the subject is a woman.

Two of Hearts – The Clasped Hands: friendship, agreement, introduction.

Three of Hearts – The Wine Bottle: cheerfulness, drunkenness, a party.

Four of Hearts – Cupid: love struck, infatuation, desire.

Five of Hearts – The Cat: flattery, companionship, protection from theft (especially if near the mouse).

Six of Hearts – The Star: clarity, guidance, spirituality.

Seven of Hearts – The Tree: good health, longevity, ancestry.

Eight of Hearts – The Moon: honor, intuition, dreams.

Nine of Hearts – The Rider:  a messenger, a visitor, news.

Ten of Hearts – The Dog: fidelity, dedication, companionship.

Jack of Hearts – The Heart: love, heartfelt emotions, romance.

Queen of Hearts – The Stork: moving house, delivery, something new.

King of Hearts – The House: a happy home, security, possessions.

Ace of Clubs – The Ring: commitment, proposal, contract, marriage.

Two of Clubs – The Eye: interest, suspicion, insight.

Three of Clubs – Lightning: disruption, a sudden change, a fright.

Four of Clubs – Justice: truth, fairness, legal matters. 

Five of Clubs – The Lamb: peace, trust, gullibility.

Six of Clubs – The Cross: sorrow, struggle, burdens.

Seven of Clubs – The Mouse: theft, intrusion, gnawing, persistence.

Eight of Clubs – The Mountain: obstruction, an impasse calling for a detour, a large problem.

Nine of Clubs – The Fox: cunning, cleverness, deceit, trickery.

Ten of Clubs – The Bear: a person in power, headstrong, authoritative, mothering, protection.

Jack of Clubs – The Rod: discipline, punishment, anger, sex.

Queen of Clubs – The Snake: an enemy, evil, treachery, temptation.

King of Clubs – The Cloud: obscurity, confusion, problems. (Consider the cloud at the top of the card ­­– the dark side is worse for the adjacent.)

Ace of Diamonds – The Sun: success, warmth, happiness.

Two of Diamonds – The Candle: peace, solitude, meditation.

Three of Diamonds – The Horseshoe: sustained luck, confidence, a token.

Four of Diamonds – Fortuna: good fortune if an opportunity is seized, a gamble, chance, a change in circumstances, destiny.

Five of Diamonds – The Pig: abundance, savings, excess fat.  

Six of Diamonds – The Clover: a lucky break, a windfall, luck in the present.

Seven of Diamonds – The Birds: communication, conversation, talk, gossip.

Eight of Diamonds – The Key: secrets revealed, to lock or unlock, security.

Nine of Diamonds – The Coffin: illness, depression, the end.

Ten of Diamonds – The Book: knowledge, secrets, education.

Jack of Diamonds – The Scythe: to cut away, to end, harvest, out of time.

Queen of Diamonds – The Path: choices, decisions, contemplation. (Ideally the path should lead to The Garden.)

King of Diamonds – The Fish: money, success in business, netting a good catch.

The Female Joker: an unexpected event, a surprise.  (This card may function as the love interest for a lesbian subject, as another woman in a love triangle, or any other woman of interest.)

The Male Joker: an unexpected event, a surprise.  (This card may function as the love interest for a gay subject, as another man in a love triangle, or any other man of interest.)


COMPARISONS

A comparison of the Fortuna, Horseshoe, and Pig cards from the diamond suit of The Hermes Playing Card Oracle and other antique oracle cards representing prosperity and luck.


The Five of Hearts and antique oracle cards that also feature cats. 


The Four of Hearts and antique oracle cards that also feature Cupid.


The Two of Clubs and the Four of Spades with antique oracle cards that also feature an eye and Hermes.


The Five of Spades and the Two of Hearts with antique oracle cards that also feature a lion and clasping hands.


The first proofs arrived in the beginning of December
story_txt:
The Hermes Playing Card Oracle is a standard deck of cards that measures 3.5" by 2.5", with 54 cards, including two jokers, on slightly thicker paper. But a divinatory symbol is included on each card.  It is both a collector's deck of playing cards and a divinatory tool. MY
STORY
I
am an artist and a scholar. I am well known as the designer of eleven
Tarot decks and three oracle decks, including The Alchemical
Tarot. The Tarot of the Sevenfold
Mystery, and the Burning Serpent oracle.  (You can see these
decks by viewing my previous Indiegogo campaigns.)  I am also a respected scholar on the subjects
of divination, mysticism, and the occult. My book, The Tarot: History, Symbolism, and Divination, was recommended as
one of the best books ever written on the subject, by the American Library
Association, in a review in their periodical, “Booklist.” 
In
the 1980s, I had a series of visionary experiences that opened my eyes to the
connections between alchemy and the Tarot and led me to designing The Alchemical Tarot.  Since then, The Alchemical Tarot has become world famous, (the first edition
has been resold for the highest price paid for a modern deck.) I have been
invited to cut the ribbon at the grand opening of the Tarot Museum in Riola,
Italy, I have curated an exhibition on the history of Tarot at the Craft and
Folk Art Museum in LA, I lecture on the history of cards regularly at the
Metropolitan Museum of Art, in New York, and one of my decks is included in
their collection.
Although
at this time most people would associate The Tarot deck with divination and
playing card decks with card games, this was not always the case. My research
has led me to the realization that all card decks, including the Tarot and
four-suit decks, have always been used for both games and divination.  In fact, historically, most diviners were more
likely to use a four-suit deck for divination.
In
the late 18th century, this trend led to the creation of a plethora
of decks that were designed primarily for divination. These decks were called
sibilla or oracle decks.  The most
popular variation was the 36-card Lenormand deck, named after the most famous
diviner of the Napoleonic period, and first published in Germany in 1847.



Each
card in an oracle deck depicted an iconic symbolic image and included a small
image of the playing card that was meant to relate to the image. Their
popularity continued up until the mid 20th century when the
re-envisioned occult Tarot deck began to take their place. It was the study of
these oracle decks in the Metropolitan Museum collection that led me to a new
appreciation of the rich history behind the images on regular playing cards. 
For
those of you who would like to delve deeper into the history of oracle cards, I
recommend my article, The History of Oracle Cards, on my website:

A History of Oracle Cards in Relation to The Burning Serpent Oracle and a New Revelation About the Origin of the Lenormand.)

MY
INSPIRATION 
I
wanted to design a deck of cards that honored these connections, that could be
used for both games and divination, and that was designed with an appreciation
for the graphic beauty and simplicity of common playing cards. So I have turned
the tradition on its head.  I have
designed an innovative deck of cards that has oracle symbols added to the
cards, a deck that honors both purposes. 







This
is not my first oracle project.  My first,
was a deck that I designed with input from the noted Tarot author Rachel
Pollack. It was called The Burning
Serpent Oracle.  I designed this deck and Rachel wrote the accompanying
book.  With The Hermes Playing Card Oracle I am including a small book that
fits in the card box and explains the basics of divination with the deck.  However, if you desire to delve more deeply
into the mysteries of divination with the oracle, I recommend reading Rachel’s
book.  It comes with the deck that I
designed, and I am offering the set together with The Hermes Playing Card Oracle as one of the perks.  



PRODUCTION

The Hermes Playing Card Oracle is now in production at the printers.  It is scheduled to be here by February first,
2016. The minimum goal for this campaign is meant to cover the printing cost,
but I will print it whether I reach the goal or not. I guarantee that I will
mail out all perks no matter how much this campaign earns.  I am planning on mailing them in February. It
is only once the goal is reached, and we go over that amount, that I will begin
to earn a profit for my work. $5,000 is only meant to me the minimum goal. So please feel free to order perks even after the goal is reached.  

THE CARDS



















PERKS
Here is a list of perks, Perks mailed in the USA are listed separately from international mailings.
$20 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle sent by priority mail in the USA - Shipping $7
$20 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle sent by priority mail anywhere in the world that the US Mail service will deliver - Shipping $25
$30 - One 8.5” by 11” archival print of any card in the deck (or a group of four cards) mailed in the USA, shipping included, (please send your preference at the end of the campaign). 

$40 - Two Hermes Playing Card Oracles sent by Priority mail in the USA - Shipping $7
$40 - Two Hermes Playing Card Oracles sent by priority mail anywhere in the world that the US Mail service will deliver - Shipping $25
$50 - One Hermes Plating Card Oracle and one Ceramic Mug featuring the two Jokers and several symbols, mailed in the USA - Shipping $15




$50 - One Hermes Plating Card Oracle and one Ceramic Mug featuring the four queens, mailed in the USA - Shipping $15



$60 - Three Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed in the USA - Shipping $7
$60 - Three Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed internationally - Shipping $25
$60 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle and one Burning Serpent Oracle deck and book  mailed in the USA - Shipping $7


$60 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle and one Burning Serpent Oracle deck and book  mailed internationally- Shipping $25
$60 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle and both versions of the New York Lenormand, one with Tarot inserts and one with playing card inserts, mailed in the USA - Shipping $7 (See my Indiegogo Campaign for the NY Lenormand for more information.) 
$60 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle and both versions of the New York Lenormand, one with Tarot inserts and one with playing card inserts, mailed Internationally - Shipping $25


$80 - Four Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed in the USA - Shipping $7
$80 - Four Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed internationally - Shipping $25
$80 - One Hermes Playing Card Oracle and both versions of the ceramic mug, mailed in the USA - Shipping $20
$100 - Six Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed in the USA - Shipping $15
$100 - Six Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed internationally - Shipping $45
$200 - Twelve Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed in the USA - Shipping $15
$200 - Twelve Hermes Playing Card Oracles mailed internationally - Shipping $45

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP 
Finally, help to spread the word. If you have enjoyed reading this, if the project excites you, then please help spread the word.  Even if you do not decide to pre-order the deck at this time, please pass on this announcement any way you can—Facebook, Twitter, email lists, blogs, simple one-on-one communications. There are share tools right on this site.

A DESCRIPTION OF THE DECK FROM THE LITTLE WHITE BOOK 


The Hermes Playing
Card Oracle is the latest oracle deck designed by Robert M. Place.  It is a standard game deck of 52 cards plus
two jokers, but with the addition of symbolic images on each card, each
providing a divinatory meaning. It can be used for card games, or laid out in
the traditional pattern, known as the Grand Tableau, and used for divination. 




Although the Tarot is the deck that most people today would
associate with divination, historically, regular four-suit decks of playing
cards were more likely to have been used for this purpose. In the late 18th
century, oracle decks were first published in which each card was illustrated
with a symbol designed primarily for divination, but a small image of the
playing card associated with each symbol was also included on each card. The
most popular oracle deck was the Petit Lenormand, first published in Germany in
1847. This deck was based on the common 36-card German deck (a deck without the
2 through 5 pip cards in each suit) and a miniature playing card was included at
the top of each card. There were, however, many variations of oracle decks
produced in the 19th century, including some based on the standard
52-card French deck.
The Hermes Playing
Card Oracle is like a traditional oracle deck, but instead of each card
being dominated by a symbolic image, with only a miniature of the associated
playing card inserted somewhere on the card, each card is a standard playing
card with the symbolic image inserted somewhere on the card. The symbolic
images on each card are ones found in traditional oracle decks, and each has a
specific meaning.  The ones on the ace,
6, 7, 8, 9, 10, and the three royal cards in each suit are the same as in the
Lenormand oracle.  If the number 2, 3, 4,
and 5 pips of each suit are removed, the deck can function as a standard
Lenormand oracle deck.  
The deck can be used for any card game, but when it is used
for divination, all of the cards are to be shuffled and laid out in the Grand
Tableau pattern.  When the deck is being
used as a standard Lenormand, the Grand Tableau will consist of four rows of
eight cards, laid out left to right from the top to the bottom row. Then the
remaining four cards are to be laid out in a fifth row, centered on the bottom.
 When all 54 of the cards in the deck are
used, which includes the two Jokers, the Grand Tableau with consist of six rows
of nine cards, laid out left to right top row to bottom.  




The most important cards in the reading are the
significators. These are the Ace of Spades, representing the subject of the
reading if she is a woman, and the Ace of Hearts, representing the subject if
he is a man. If the subject is a woman then the Ace of Hearts may represent her
love interest, and likewise the Ace of Spades may serve this function for a
man. This relationship is strongest when the male and female cards seem to be
facing each other. If the subject is a lesbian woman, the Female Joker may
serve as the love interest. Likewise, the Male Joker may serve this function
for a gay man.  Although traditionally romantic
relationships are a major focus for oracle readings, the cards may be used to
divine on any subject, and the second significator and the Jokers may be used
to represent others, such as friends or relatives.
When reading the spread, first locate the significator and
determine which way she or he is facing. The cards in a horizontal or diagonal
line extending from the front of the significator (that she or he is facing)
represent the future.  The cards
extending horizontally or diagonally behind the significator represent the
past.  The cards in a vertical line
directly above and below the significator represent the present.  Cards below the significator represent issues
that have been mastered by the significator and ones above still present a
challenge. The cards closest to the significator are the strongest in the their
influence and the ones further away are the weakest or most distant in time.  
Also pay attention to images that are facing the significator
and therefore moving toward her or him, also ones that are facing away and
moving away. Direction is especially important when considering the King of
Clubs, with the Cloud on his card. Pay attention to the cloud that appears at
the top of the card.  It has a dark negative
side and a light positive side. The dark side will weaken or obscure the card
next to it.  
There are also layouts with fewer cards, and the cards can
be used in any layout recommended for Lenormand cards. To learn more, any good
book on Lenormand cards will be helpful, such as The Burning Serpent Oracle by Rachel Pollack. 

The Meanings of the Cards
Ace of Spades – The
Woman: the significator if the subject is a woman or the love interest if
the subject is a man.
Two of Spades – The
Crossed Swords: attack, debate, a difference of opinion.
Three of Spades – The
Bee: work, industry, productivity.
Four of Spades – Hermes:
speed, protection, insight, guidance, commerce, healing. 
Five of Spades – The
Lion: courage, strength, discipline.
Six of Spades – The
Tower: authority, leadership, solitude. 
Seven of Spades – The
letter: a message, news, documents.
Eight of Spades – The
Garden: community, a gathering, acceptance.
Nine of Spades – The
Anchor: stability, hope, virtue.
Ten of Spades – The
Ship: a journey, travel, an adventure. 
Jack of Spades – The
Child: innocence, youth, playfulness.
Queen of Spades – The
Bouquet: a gift, appreciation, beauty. 
King of Spades – The
Lily: sexuality, maturity, purity. 
Ace of Hearts – The
Man: the significator if the subject is a man or the love interest if the
subject is a woman.
Two of Hearts – The
Clasped Hands: friendship, agreement, introduction.
Three of Hearts – The
Wine Bottle: cheerfulness, drunkenness, a party. 
Four of Hearts –
Cupid: love struck, infatuation, desire.
Five of Hearts – The
Cat: flattery, companionship, protection from theft (especially if near the
mouse).
Six of Hearts – The
Star: clarity, guidance, spirituality.
Seven of Hearts – The
Tree: good health, longevity, ancestry. 
Eight of Hearts – The
Moon: honor, intuition, dreams.
Nine of Hearts – The
Rider:  a messenger, a visitor, news.

Ten of Hearts – The
Dog: fidelity, dedication, companionship.
Jack of Hearts – The
Heart: love, heartfelt emotions, romance.
Queen of Hearts – The
Stork: moving house, delivery, something new.
King of Hearts – The
House: a happy home, security, possessions. 
Ace of Clubs – The
Ring: commitment, proposal, contract, marriage. 
Two of Clubs – The
Eye: interest, suspicion, insight.
Three of Clubs – Lightning:
disruption, a sudden change, a fright. 
Four of Clubs –
Justice: truth, fairness, legal matters. 

Five of Clubs – The
Lamb: peace, trust, gullibility. 
Six of Clubs – The Cross:
sorrow, struggle, burdens. 
Seven of Clubs – The
Mouse: theft, intrusion, gnawing, persistence.
Eight of Clubs – The
Mountain: obstruction, an impasse calling for a detour, a large problem. 
Nine of Clubs – The
Fox: cunning, cleverness, deceit, trickery. 
Ten of Clubs – The
Bear: a person in power, headstrong, authoritative, mothering, protection.
Jack of Clubs – The
Rod: discipline, punishment, anger, sex. 
Queen of Clubs – The
Snake: an enemy, evil, treachery, temptation. 
King of Clubs – The
Cloud: obscurity, confusion, problems. (Consider the cloud at the top of the card ­­– the
dark side is worse for the adjacent.) 
Ace of Diamonds – The
Sun: success, warmth, happiness.
Two of Diamonds – The
Candle: peace, solitude, meditation.
Three of Diamonds –
The Horseshoe: sustained luck, confidence, a token. 
Four of Diamonds –
Fortuna: good fortune if an opportunity is seized, a gamble, chance, a
change in circumstances, destiny. 
Five of Diamonds –
The Pig: abundance, savings, excess fat.  
Six of Diamonds – The
Clover: a lucky break, a windfall, luck in the present.
Seven of Diamonds –
The Birds: communication, conversation, talk, gossip. 
Eight of Diamonds –
The Key: secrets revealed, to lock or unlock, security.
Nine of Diamonds –
The Coffin: illness, depression, the end. 
Ten of Diamonds – The
Book: knowledge, secrets, education. 
Jack of Diamonds –
The Scythe: to cut away, to end, harvest, out of time.
Queen of Diamonds –
The Path: choices, decisions, contemplation. (Ideally the path should lead
to The Garden.)
King of Diamonds –
The Fish: money, success in business, netting a good catch. 
The Female Joker:
an unexpected event, a surprise.  (This
card may function as the love interest for a lesbian subject, as another woman
in a love triangle, or any other woman of interest.)
The Male Joker:
an unexpected event, a surprise.  (This
card may function as the love interest for a gay subject, as another man in a
love triangle, or any other man of interest.)

COMPARISONS
A comparison of the Fortuna, Horseshoe, and Pig cards from the diamond suit of The Hermes Playing Card Oracle and other antique oracle cards representing prosperity and luck.

The Five of Hearts and antique oracle cards that also feature cats. 


The Four of Hearts and antique oracle cards that also feature Cupid.
The Two of Clubs and the Four of Spades with antique oracle cards that also feature an eye and Hermes.




The Five of Spades and the Two of Hearts with antique oracle cards that also feature a lion and clasping hands.

story:
Help us bring NECROMANCER Class to old-school Midgard Rising 3D MMORPG for iOS, Android, Mac, PC, Linux, OUYA, Game Stick

NECROMANCER will be able to summon unholy creatures ad wield foul magic. 

If you have any question and want to find out more about the game and amazing beta community visit the game forum.

Click here to visit development forum

We will deliver Mithril, Mount & XP Booster, instant ALT Level Up perks every Saturday (for past week) during funding period but only to those who use paypal  to fund perk. Those who use credit card will get perks after funding period ends.

All Perks/Rewards include ALL cumulative previous rewards. 

 

THE OLD SCHOOL MMO RPG RETURNS

Do you remember Ultima Online, early days of Everquest 1 or other games from that era?

Do you remember the days when MMO Role-Playing Games were actually about RPG, deep immersion in the game world and a community of like minded players?

We teamed up to create a new old-school MMO RPG which brings all that back.

Midgard Rising is a multi-platform, old-school 3D MMO RPG core game, the kind you used to enjoy in the past, now about to be brought to your Mac, PC & Linux, mobile devices (Android, iOS), and new consoles OUYA and GameStick.

All players will play on the same servers.

How many times you wished to be able to take your PC or Mac game with you? 

Well now you are about to be able to.

Here you can download EARLY BETA version for different platforms:

Click here to download iOS version from iTunes

Click here to download Android version from Google Play

Click here to download Mac & PC version from our forum

[Linux version needs some work but should be ready soon] 

 

 

 

Read what others have said about World of Midgard

"And you've seen a lot of them offering to let you play on both mobile devices and on your desktop...

Wait, that part is kind of new. And if it appeals to you, you should probably take a look at..."

Original article is here

 

"It's crazy what we're starting to see on mobile devices as the performance gap closes more and more with each iteration of mobile technology."

"Back in the day when I was playing EverQuest, Dark Age of Camelot [...] I never thought I'd be playing something that looked even remotely similar on my phone. Enter World of Midgard..."

Original article is here

 

"There are dungeons as well as raid dungeons, PvP arenas, mounts, gear sets, quests, lot and lots of items and pretty much everything you expect to find in an MMORPG. This one is also cross-platform compatible..."

Original article is here

 

 

Midgard Rising offers rich, amazing, full 3D fantasy world, together with full support for factions conflict, factions battleground, rated arenas, 10-man raiding system, and more.

On plot level, Midgard Rising focuses on a conflict between the two warring faction, the Alliance and the Fury, the struggle between them, and also their fight against a common enemy, the Swarm.

The game has a deeply immersing lore, which tells the story of the past of  Midgard’s heroes, the battles they fought, and the tale of the Schism, the Swarm, Survival & Conquest, and the Treaty of the Fallen Oak. Those who want to find out more about the game lore should check the link that enables the download of the book.

Click here to download Lore Book Sample

During your journey through the game’s world you will immerse yourself in a world inspired by Norse mythology. There are 6 playable character races: Human, Elf, and Dwarf belonging to the Alliance, and Orc, Dark Elf, and Blood Drak belonging to the Fury. In addition to selecting a race, you can choose from 5 different classes, which represent a unique style of the particular player.

The classes are: Confessors, Fighter, Mage, Rogues, and Templar. Ranger Class with Combat Pets will be added if we reach the goal. The game world is already huge, but it will grow even bigger with each content update -meaning  more quests, more zones, more dungeons, more mounts and more kick-ass gear sets.

And, have I mentioned that while the whole leveling game play is fun, and includes hundreds of quests in open world, solo dungeons and 5-man dungeon leveling system, the game really focuses on end of the game experience? It’s true! Therefore reaching the level cap is just the beginning of the real core game experience, which includes a very unique end-game 5-man dungeons, 10-man raids, battlegrounds, and rated arenas.

Click here to check development videos on our youtube channel

Why do we ask for help?

All players are asking us to add Ranger class and how kick-ass it would be for that class to tame beasts and use as combat pets. We agree with those players.

 

Note: Necromancer will be added only if we reach our goal. If compaign does not reach the goal we will use money collected for developing other game features.

story:
A new and innovative approach to financial literacy. An experiential game in which players are put in real life situations while having fun.



Getting better is important to us. In the event that you opt not to contribute to the campaign, please take a couple of seconds to help us understand why (so that we can improve) Click here to take survey

Contribute To Creating A More Financially Sound Generation 

Freedom Quest is a free-to-play game designed to put players through real life financial challenges as they compete with their friends and worldwide opponents to be the wealthiest and most popular player.

Freedom Quest's Purpose/Mission?

According to Alan Greenspan, the former Chairman of the Federal Reserve, "the number one problem in today's generation and economy is the lack of financial literacy". Whether you are a fan of Greenspan or not, you cannot deny the veracity of that statement. Should you doubt his words, you need not look further than our debt load, our pitiful savings, our love affair with consumerism, and the costly financial mistakes we as a society make over and over again. Despite its importance, the unfortunate truth is that financial literacy is not being taught in homes or in schools. As a result, people go through life clueless and only learn the hard way; from making their own mistakes.... some of them more costly than others...


Our solution is Freedom Quest: players will experience real life situations and have to make decisions based on real life variables. They will then have to live with the consequences of their actions and see the full ramifications of unsound decisions. The learning is gradual, so there is no need for prior experience/knowledge; we will teach players everything they need to know through the game, and the difficulty level will increase as they progress.

So going back to the purpose of Freedom Quest? To provide a safe learning environment so that mistakes can be made in the game and not in real life! After playing our game, players will be significantly more knowledgeable on financial matters, which should translate to better financial decisions in the real world.

How And What Will Players Learn?

Throughout the game, players will be able to get financial tips and advice from the game's many mentors and characters. They will learn about assets and liabilities, income and expenses, saving and investing, debt and credit score, taxes and collections. The gameplay will extend into investment, passive income,  retirement and such once the player is "ready", based on their in-game performance . Everything is progressive.

In addition, players will constantly have to make real life trade offs such as focusing on Net-worth or financial status, eating healthy vs buying fast food, buying a new car vs a used one, cash vs debt....etc, the lessons are endless! By being exposed to it all, players will learn the value of sound financial decisions, and more importantly, they will have the knowledge to know what constitute a sound financial decision!


As players progress through the game and compete against their friends, they will be exposed to buying a house, purchasing a car, starting a business...etc, complete with real life choices such as size of down payment, amortization, interest rate, fixed or variable, open or closed...etc (introduced gradually and in a fun way). With changing circumstances and economic cycles, the players will quickly find out if they made the right choice.

We are aware that every country and province/state has different tax brackets, interest rates, retirement saving plans...etc. For the purpose of the game, we use averages and generalities to convey the message. The numbers in the player’s specific geographical region might be slightly higher or lower, but they won't differ too much, and the lessons will still be applicable.

We understand that finance can be boring topic, so as much as we want to create an educational game, we are determined to make it an engaging, fun, social, interactive, and competitive experience.

Q&A Video 

To our generous contributors and everybody that kindly shared and/or covered our story, thank you very much for your support. This was originally meant to be a Kickstarter Campaign (hence why our videos are addressed to a Kickstarter audience), but they shut us down 48hrs prior to launch! (For more details please feel free to read our blog post on the matter click here).

Current Development

We’ve been working on this game for over a year now. A fair amount of research went into the project to ensure that we are bringing you the most entertaining and interactive way to learn about personal finance. The pictures shown throughout this page are screenshots from our working prototype.

With your support, we can polish up the game, continue to implement all of the interactive learning features, and bring Freedom Quest to every tablet, phone, and computer worldwide.

Your contribution will fund:

  • Improved Artist Designs
  • Development Licenses
  • Game Hosting
  • Making the game cross platform

Rewards

Badges

To thank you for your generous contribution, we would like to send you a personalized badge so that the world can see what an awesome and kind person you are! In order to receive your badge before the end of the campaign, please reach out to us via social media: Facebook or Twitter preferably (or email if you don't have an account). Once we broadcast to the world how eternally grateful we are and how undeserving we are of your generosity, your friends and family will never look at you the same again ;)

Expert Tip Bundles

The expert tip bundles are in game purchases. They unlock and allow the player to receive free financial advice on the specified topic, without having to pay in game currency or having to wait for the advice. Our Indiegogo supporters get an awesome head start!

Who are we?

We are an educational technology company with a passion to create fun and innovative content that will revolutionize the way people think and learn about money. Our mission is to produce content that will ignite conversations around finance, and that will contribute to radically improving the financial literacy of a whole generation. A lot of the financial mistakes we make early in life (and let’s be honest, sometimes later on too) could have easily been prevented had we had the chance to learn sound financial principles. Our goal is to make the learning process fun, interactive, social, and competitive….did we mention fun? 



For more information, feel free to head to our website www.Ignov8.com


Risks and Challenges

We did our best to plan for every possible challenge and eventuality. That being said, like all high tech ventures, we could run into technical difficulties that slow us down. Our biggest concern is getting behind schedule, but since our starting point is a pretty good working prototype, chances of that happening are fairly slim.
So what other challenges can we anticipate?
- We will need to hire an awesome graphic artist to polish the game
- We will need additional developers to implement some of the more complex features
- We will have to optimize for both Apple and Android devices with cross platform compatibility
- We will have to organize and run tournaments
- We will depend heavily on our beta testers (supporters) to provide feedback and shape this into a game the people truly want
- We will have to convince our parents that this is real work and not just us playing on our computers.

The last one will be the trickiest.

A new and innovative approach to financial literacy. An 
experiential game in which players are put in real life situations while
 having fun.


Getting better is important to us. In the event that you opt not to contribute to the campaign, please take a couple of seconds to help us understand why (so that we can improve) Click here to take surveyContribute To Creating A More Financially Sound Generation
