Complete your missions by facing a boss with a tremendous
action.Discover mini-games in line with your special skills.Push your luck by playing a commando squad only
consisted of real players and take advantage of your friend’s experience. 


Personalize your spaceship by improving its equipment, or
simply by adding your blazon on the hull.Modify the internal layout of your spacecraft with the
spaceship editor and create a custom version by choosing where to place each
room, corridor and equipment.Buy a generic station and add modules to upgrade its features,
such as a residential compartment, a factory or a warehouse.Customize the residential modules by assigning shopping
districts and housing areas and impose then a building standard.Seize areas and impose taxes and settlements to the station
owners, manage the protection of the sector, setup automatic booster to
optimize the commercial traffic.Wear your armband or personalize your armor by adding
your blazon.




Click here for english version.Oro Space est un jeu de
rôle massivement multijoueur né de la fusion d’un jeu d’action-RPG et d’une
simulation spatiale. Il propose un système axé sur de l’action à la troisième
personne intégrant du pilotage en temps réel et offrant une liberté d’action
propre aux simulations spatiales.
Nous sommes fiers de
vous présenter ce projet, fruit d’une longue réflexion dans le but de concilier
les avantages de nos deux types de jeux préférés.Nous
espérons que ce nouveau genre saura vous séduire. 





Incarnez un cadet de l’académie spatiale issu d’une des 5 races
connues qui coexistent dans Oro Space.Choisissez les compétences correspondantes à un premier métier
et développez les.Évoluez dans un vaste univers composé d’une centaine de
secteurs reliés par des portails spatiaux.Dévoilez les mystères de l’univers, des imprévisibles anomalies
spatiales aux fragments de l’Histoire Oubliée.Rejoignez une corporation, un groupe de rebelles ou de pirates
et participez à leur ascension ou à leur chute.
Pilotez votre vaisseau et recrutez votre équipage au grè de
vos rencontres.Explorez les nombreuses stations spatiales et planètes de la
galaxie.Menez au combat votre commando sélectionné parmi vos membres
d’équipage ou rejoignez un commando existant.Accumulez des richesses, créez votre propre groupe,
achetez un appartement, une station et qui sait... votre propre
secteur.





Entrez dans un monde à l’équilibre précaire où les corporations
et le Conseil des races s'opposent.Sélectionnez l’une des 5 races jouables de l’univers : un
Lutin, un Nain, un Humain, un Elfe ou un Orque.Découvrez les spécificités de chaque espèce, qu’il s’agisse du
design de station et vaisseaux, d’attributs physiques, de préférence
technologique ou de l’organisation de leurs secteurs principaux.Laissez-vous guider par une histoire enivrante vous permettant
de découvrir les possibilités du jeu.Rejoignez l’une des 60 corporations et découvrez l'histoire
et les objectifs qui la caractérisent.Effectuez des missions pour cette corporation et montez en
grade au fur et à mesure de vos réussites.
Développez votre réputation auprès des différentes factions
pour débloquer l’accès à des secteurs, missions, équipements...Pensez différemment et rejoignez un groupe de pirates ou une
faction rebelle pour changer le monde en bien ou pour vos propres intérêts.
Rencontrez et recrutez des joueurs ou PNJ pour compléter votre
équipage et votre commando.Découvrez que l’ensemble des personnages du jeu disposent de
traits de caractère uniques qui forgent leur identité.Observez l'évolution de la loyauté de vos équipiers selon vos
actions.Discutez avec votre équipage pour découvrir leurs affinités et
renforcez leur loyauté à votre égard, ou... payez-les!Profitez des contacts de vos membres d’équipage pour obtenir de
nouvelles quêtes.Constatez que votre réputation et celle de votre équipage envers
les différentes factions débloquent de nouvelles quêtes.Évoluez dans un monde où tout peut arriver : que vous soyez en
pleine discussion dans votre vaisseau ou simplement en train de faire du
shopping dans une station spatiale.
Anticipez le futur en débloquant progressivement des
fragments de l’Histoire Oubliée et, utilisez les leçons du passé pour changer le
futur.Appréciez les 6 types de mini jeux différents ainsi que leurs
nombreuses variations.
Accédez à de nouvelles options de dialogue à mesure que vous gagnez en compétence.Retrouvez tous vos amis qu’ils soient sous Windows,
Mac ou Linux grâce au support multiplateformes.





Choisissez un des 65 vaisseaux disponibles dans l’une des 13
classes existantes.
Sélectionnez un vaisseau pour son design, ses équipements et profitez des bonus
raciaux :

Les
Lutins ont un bonus de vitesse
Les
Nains ont un bonus d’armure
Les
Humains ont un bonus en maniabilité
Les
Elfes ont un bonus en bouclier
Les
Orques ont un bonus de puissance offensive


Pilotez votre vaisseau en temps réel aux cotés de milliers
d’autres joueurs; du simple vaisseau de reconnaissance de 10m à l’immense
Transporteur lourd de 3km.Transportez des ressources ou personnes en tant que coursier,
taxis ou marchand.
Exploitez des astéroïdes pour en extraire des ressources et utilisez celles-ci
dans vos usines de production ou revendez les.Escortez des vaisseaux, patrouillez dans des secteurs ou protégez des stations
des menaces extérieures.Détruisez les vaisseaux qui vous attaquent ou abordez-les pour vous en emparer.



Achetez, déployez et gérez votre station spatiale dans le
secteur de votre choix.Approvisionnez votre station en ressource afin de pouvoir revendre ses
produits.
Utilisez l’économie locale et les différences de tarif à votre avantage pour
générer des bénéfices.Scannez les astéroïdes pour découvrir de nouvelles sources d’approvisionnement.
A mesure que vous explorer les secteurs, découvrez les ressources,
stations et surprises qui s’y cachent.
Formez votre groupe et forgez des alliances pour atteindre vos
objectifs.Prenez un secteur, personnalisez-le et laissez votre
marque dans l’univers.







Sélectionnez votre commando parmi vos membres d’équipage et
affectez-leurs un des 6 rôles existants :


Tank,

Démolition,

Soldat,

Médecin,

Ingénieur,

Hacker.




Assignez une armure adaptée aux rôles et aux capacités
spéciales de chacun de vos équipiers.Combattez des hordes d’ennemis au côté de votre commando dans
les missions de désinfestation.Découvrez un système stratégique évolué qui vous permet de contrôler votre
commando et d’utiliser ses capacités spéciales ou de lui donner des
consignes visuelles.Affrontez des gangs ou des milices armées, que ce soit dans des
modules de station ou sur des bâtiments terrestres.Utilisez votre commando pour repousser un abordage ou … pour
prendre le contrôle d’un vaisseau adverse en pleine bataille spatiale.Profitez d’une plus grande immersion grâce à un système qui
réduit votre mobilité au fur et à mesure que vous encaissez des dégâts.Neutralisez vos adversaires en leur infligeant des blessures
incapacitantes grâce au système de dégâts de zone.Améliorez votre personnage et vos équipiers via l’évolution des
compétences et le déblocage de points à répartir dans l’arbre des capacités
spéciales.
Finissez vos missions en affrontant un boss dans des actions
spectaculaires.Découvrez des mini-jeux adaptés à l’utilisation de vos
capacités spéciales.Profitez de l’expérience de vos amis en jouant avec un
commando composé uniquement de joueurs.





Personnalisez votre vaisseau en améliorant son équipement, ou
simplement en ajoutant votre blason sur la coque.Modifiez l’agencement interne de votre vaisseaux via l’éditeur
et créez votre version personnalisée en choisissant où placer chaque pièce,
couloir et équipement.Achetez une station de base et ajoutez des modules pour étendre
ses fonctionnalités, qu’il s’agisse de module résidentiel, d’usine ou de simple
entrepôt.Personnalisez les modules résidentiels en assignant des zones
commerciales ainsi que des zones d’habitations puis imposez le standing des
bâtiments.
Emparez-vous de secteurs et imposez vos taxes et zones
d’installations aux possesseurs de station, gérez la protection du secteur,
installez des booster automatiques pour densifier le trafic commercial et
optimiser vos revenus.Ajoutez votre brassard de faction ou personnalisez
votre armure en y ajoutant votre blason.

story:
HEER46 ist ein deutscher Miniaturen-Hersteller für Wargames-Zubehör im Maßstab 15mm/1:100 und neuerdings auch im Maßstab 28mm/1:48.

HEER46 is a German miniatures-company that produces wargaming-miniatures
and add-ons in the 15mm/1:100 scale and also soon in the 28mm/1:48 scale. 

 

Im Maßstab 15mm/1:100 hat HEER46 bereits einige Modelle produziert, die qualitativ als sehr hochwertig angesehen werden. Rezensionen dieser Modelle finden sich hier:

HEER46 already offers a range of models in the 15mm/1:100 scale, which are considered to be of high quality. Reviews of these models can be found here:  

Brückenkopf (german)

http://www.brueckenkopf-online.com/?p=94381

Modelbrush
http://www.modelbrush.com/review-heer46-e100-krupp-15mm/

Massive Voodoo
http://massivevoodoo.blogspot.de/2013/11/mu-37-heer-46-panzerkampfwagen-75c-e.html

Warum diese Finanzierungs-Kampagne?

Das Ziel der Kampagne ist es, den Panzerkampfwagen Löwe im Maßstab 28mm/1:48 herzustellen. Zur Verwirklichung des Projekts sind verschiedene Schritte notwendig. Dies beginnt mit dem Erstellen der Dateien für den 3-D Druck des Masters, setzt sich über die Anfertigung der Gussformen fort und endet schließlich mit der Produktion des finalen Bausatzes. Diese Schritte sind leider sehr kostenintensiv und von einer Person nicht so leicht zu stemmen, außerdem lässt sich so eher die Nachfrage einschätzen.

Why this funding-campaign?

The goal of the campaign is the production of the Panzerkampfwagen Löwe in 28mm/1:48 scale. The realization of this project necessitates several steps, beginning with the rendering of the files for the 3D-printing, leading to the production of the molds and concluding with the production of the final model-kit. Those steps are quite costly and for one person it´s not that easy to fund such a project. Also the funding-campaign allows us to gouge the demand.

Der Löwe besteht aus mehreren Teilen, die aus Resin und Metall hergestellt werden.

The Löwe consists of several parts, made of resin and metal.

 

Für den Löwen wird es zwei Modellvarianten zur Auswahl geben:

Variante 1 ist der normale Panzerkampfwagen Löwe mit einer 10,5-cm Kanone.

Variante 2 ist der Flak-Löwe mit einer 5,5cm Zwilling-Flak.

 

You will be able to choose from two Löwe-versions:

Version 1 is the standard Panzerkampfwagen Löwe with a 10,5 cm gun.

Version 2 is the Flak-Löwe armed with a 5,5cm Twin-Flak.

 


Etappenziel 1 = 2.000€

Jeder Löwe-Bausatz erhält ein kostenfreies UHU-Infarotsystem.

 

Stretchgoal 1 = 2.000€

Each Löwe-kit gets an „UHU“ IR-system for free.

 

Etappenziel 2 = 4.000€

Beide Löwe-Varianten erhalten kostenfrei je eine weitere Kanone, die sich zwar nur optisch unterscheidet, aber perfekt zu einem sehr „staubigen“ Spiel passt.

 

Variante 1 

Alternative Kanone für den normalen Panzerkampfwagen Löwe.



Variante 2 

Alternative Kanone für den Flak-Löwe.

 

Stretchgoal 2 = 4.000€

Both Löwe-versions get an additional alternate cannon for free. The
difference is purely optical, but fits in perfectly with a certain „dustified“
game.

 

Version 1

Alternate cannon for the standard Panzerkampfwagen Löwe.

Version 2

Alternate cannon for the Flak-Löwe.

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

Etappenziel 3 = 6.000€

Jeder Panzer braucht einen Kommandanten. Jeder Löwe-Bausatz erhält kostenfrei
einen Panzerkommandanten „Max Wünsche". Die Miniatur ist aus Metall und im
Maßstab 28mm/1:48.


Stretchgoal 3 = 6.000€

Each tank needs a tank-commander. Each Löwe-kit gets one tank-commander
“Max Wünsche” for free. The miniature is made of metal and in 28mm/1:48 scale. 

 

I hope this is the right way.......

Mh.........

 

Auslieferung / Delivery

Die Auslieferung der Panzer ist für Juni 2014 geplant. Sollte der Panzer früher
fertiggestellt werden können, erfolgt die Versendung umgehend.

The estimated delivery date for the tank is June 2014. In case the tank
gets finished earlier than expected, shipping will take place as soon as
possible.

 

 

Peark-Level

 

5€ Schütze

Dein Name wird im HEER46-Blog verewigt.

Your name will be immortalized in the HEER46-blog.

 

38€ Gefreiter

Wähle zwischen einem normalen Löwe oder einem Flak-Löwe.

Choose between one standard Löwe or one Flak-Löwe.


76€ Feldwebel

Du bekommst jeweils einen Panzerkampfwagen Löwe und einen Flak-Löwen

You get your own Panzerkampfwagen Löwe and one Flak-Löwe.

 114€ Unteroffizier

Du bekommst drei Panzer und kannst dabei beliebig zwischen normalem Löwe und/oder Flak-Löwe wählen.

You get three tanks and you can freely choose between the standard Löwe and/or
the Flak-Löwe.


152€ Offizier

Du bekommst vier Panzer und kannst dabei beliebig zwischen normalem Löwe
und/oder Flak-Löwe wählen. Du erhältst außerdem noch ein Maßband mit dem
HEER46-Logo.

You get four tanks and you can freely choose between the standard Löwe and/or
the Flak-Löwe. You will also get a tape measure with the HEER46-logo.


380€ General

Du bekommst zehn Panzer und kannst dabei beliebig zwischen normalem Löwe
und/oder Flak-Löwe wählen. Du erhältst außerdem noch ein Maßband mit dem
HEER46-Logo und ein Polo-Shirt

You get ten tanks and you can freely choose between the standard Löwe and/or
the Flak-Löwe. You will also get a tape measure with the HEER46-logo
and a polo-shirt.

 

Team Kampagne

Design & Production: HEER46

Translation & Counseling: André Winter (L'Art Noir)

Photograph: Andreas Schnatz  http://www.andreasschnatz.de

Painted Max Wünsche: Thomas Stoesser " Stoessi"

story:
Weekly Update!
We're working on video about weapon setting and control.

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vne7iIWFi3U





WE GOT GREENLIGHT!!!

Dark Drive is a classic side-scrolling Action-RPG game that was made in retro style to let player enjoy the familiarness and was combined with the action style of newer game generation for the best balance.

Dark Drive was inspired by Metroid, Castlevania: Symphony of the night and Devil May Cry. This game, Dark Drive, will make player explore the story scenario and fight actively through it with the main character. We will do our best to make Dark Drive become a memorable game.

We had been trying to create the concept of Dark Drive for a very long time while we were having full-time jobs, and then after we had all the conclusions, we decided that this game has potential and agreed to start the production process. In order to develop Dark Drive, the Rambutan team assessed that we would have to put all effort and concentrate all power on it.  We quit our jobs to make this project become true. This project will take one year and we will require funds for the followings:

- Software: Purchases of licensed software for developers.
- Sound Designer: For better sound quality, we have to hire a Sound Designer to work with us.

We choose IndieGogo because we would like everyone to take a look at our project and be the judge of whether "Dark Drive" should be created or not, and this is our main objective:

"We will create enjoyable game which will make our players feel that it is totally worth paying for."


"The Horizon... 
It is a gigantic fort in the space, 
built as a monumental symbol of power of the mankind in the beginning of the 3rd Millennium 
and equipped with assault machines and artificial intelligence able of developing weapons on their own."

After the construction was completed and before its first debut, The Horizon was taken over and completely controlled by a Union’s agent from R.A.A. (Risk Against Agent) unit, the agent No.1 whose codename is Nate.

The pursue of Nate and The Horizon is difficult due to the fort’s special ability to space jump and its omnipotent camouflage system. The Union will have to use extreme measures in order to recapture The Horizon.

They will do it, even if The Horizon may suffer some damages.

Besides seizing The Horizon, Nate also took a hostage, who is the daughter of R.A.A. agent No.21, codename Spik. Nate secretly contacted Spik and, without any explanation, made a negotiation with Spik which requires him to travel to The Horizon.

Therefore, Spik decided to travel to The Horizon to rescue his daughter, and to find out the reason behind Nate’s action.

  • Weapon

There are two types of weapons in this game, Melee Weapon and Ranged Weapon. Player can match their weapons of choice and can freely change weapons. 

  • Ranged Weapon 

Ranged weapon can attack an enemy from further distance.

   

  • Melee Weapon Combo

Melee weapon can make combo freely.

   

  • Drive System

Drive System is a special attack that has limited usage from Melee Weapon.

   

  • Upgrade

Melee weapon, Ranged weapon, Drive system and Combo will eventually get their own upgrades through the story progress of the game, for the fun of finding out "What's the next upgrade will we get?" 

  • Various Scenario

In the adventure of finding the truth in "The Horizon," you'll be faced with many scenarios that have different settings and put you in various situations. Gameplay will vary and become more challenging.

  • EPIC Boss Fight!!



Spik : R.A.A. No. 21

Age : 30

"Spik is a careful and strategic person. However, he is likely to act by his own decision more than the organization’s rules. He has no mercy for anything vicious." 

Mary : Spik's daughter

Age : 9

"Mary is an adopted child of Spik, yet he rarely has time for her. Her real father is Demitry, a mafia godfather who was assassinated by Spik."

Nate : R.A.A. No. 1

Age : ??

"Nate’s history is unknown. He is a genius with well-rounded skills who became the first R.A.A. agent. No one has any idea of what made him seize and take over The Horizon."


We are determined to accomplish the project “Dark Drive” and have set Stretch Goal in order to keep improving the quality of the game. When the fund allowance reaches specific points, we will do as follows;

55,000$ Extended Game Play!

We will make the game even more completed by adding alternate storyline, multiple endings and secret upgrades to let player enjoy more exploration.

70,000$ New game+

We will add a bigger challenge, New Game+ mode, which will add to the game’s replayable value.

100,000$ new weapon

New Weapon! More Melee Weapons, Combos and Drive system to add more spice to the gameplay.

120,000$ TBA


Full Game

A digital download copy of full game for PC.


Beta Access

An access to join Beta Test version of the game.


Digital Guide Book

A digital download copy of the game’s Guidebook.


Credit Thank you

Your name will appear on the Ending Credits.


Sound Track

A digital download copy of Dark Drive Sound Track.


Extra Copy

You’ll obtain an extra digital download copy, in case you would like a friend to play too. 


Digital Art Book

You’ll be able to digitally download the whole art book of Dark Drive.


Dark Drive Key chain

A key chain souvenir of Dark Drive.


Hard Cover Artbook

A Hard Cover Art Book of Dark Drive, with a code to use to download a Digital Download version.


Physical Guidebook

A real and palpable copy of soft-cover Guidebook, with a code to use to download a Digital Download version.

*Only Avaliable in Ultimate Box.


Physical Soundtrack

A real and palpable copy of the original soundtrack CD of Dark Drive, with a code to use to download a Digital Download version.
*Only Avaliable in Ultimate Box.


Physical Game box

A real and palpable copy of the Full Game, with a code to use to download a Digital Download version.

*Only Avaliable in Ultimate Box


Ultimate Box

An Ultimate Box Set of Dark Drive game which includes everything as follows:
Full Game + Extra Copy, 
Dark Drive Key Chain, 
Physical Guidebook, 
Physical Soundtrack, 
Hard Cover Art book + Digital Download version of Art Book.


R.A.A. Avatar

You will become R.A.A. No. 5 – No. 9 and will receive your codename. Be a part of the game story in Dark Drive.

1$ Thank you!

Thank you for supporting Dark Drive project!

We will not disappoint you.


10$ [Limited] Full game

You'll get Full Game with this special price as a thank you for early support!
But this is limited for only 1000 persons.
Available in Digital download only.


12$ Full game

You'll get Full Game.
Available in Digital download only.


15$ With the Guidance!

Everything above, plus a PDF Digital Download of the guidebook.


20$ Credit Thank you

Everything above, plus your name’s appearance in the end of credits.


30$ Original Soundtrack Tier

Everything above, plus a Digital Download of Dark Drive OST.


40$ Duo Pack!

Everything above, plus an additional Digital Download copy of Dark Drive.


60$ Art of the Dark Drive

Everything above, plus a Digital Download copy of Dark Drive Art Book.


80$ Physical Dark Drive Tier 1!

Everything above, plus Limited Dark Drive Key chain!


120$ Physical Dark Drive Tier 2!

Everything above, plus a Hard Cover copy of Dark Drive Artbook.


120$ [Limited] Ultimate Tier!

SPECIAL PRICE!! Available for only 50 persons.

You'll get a physical copy of Limited Box Set that includes everything above and an access to the game's Beta Test version.


150$ Ultimate Tier!

You'll get a physical copy of Limited Box Set that includes everything above and an access to the game's Beta Test version.


1000$ R.A.A. Tier!

Become one of the R.A.A. agents and be a part of the game’s story;
Nate : R.A.A. No. 1. 
Spik : R.A.A. No. 21. 
and then... 
YOU! : R.A.A. No. 5 - No. 9
…and of course, you will also get a physical copy of Ultimate Box Set and Beta Test Access!

Data Chou

-Director, Lead artist

Civalice

-Lead programmer, Level design, Sound engineer

Buta Masaki

-Concept artist


With our long years of working in the game industry, this is the first big project we have ever started on our own. We have begun the project since 3 months ago and now is the time to drop everything else to fully concentrate on Dark Drive.

Every creative project must go through various obstacles. We often discuss and debate in order to brainstorm better ideas to apply to our work. In the end, we will achieve our goal.
story_txt:
Weekly Update!We're working on video about weapon setting and control. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vne7iIWFi3UWE GOT GREENLIGHT!!!Dark
Drive is a classic side-scrolling Action-RPG game that was made in retro style
to let player enjoy the familiarness and was combined with the action style of newer
game generation for the best balance.

Dark
Drive was inspired by Metroid, Castlevania: Symphony of the night and Devil May
Cry. This game, Dark Drive, will make player explore the story scenario and
fight actively through it with the main character. We will do our best to make
Dark Drive become a memorable game.We
had been trying to create the concept of Dark Drive for a very long time while
we were having full-time jobs, and then after we had all the conclusions, we
decided that this game has potential and agreed to start the production
process. In order to develop Dark Drive, the Rambutan team assessed that we would
have to put all effort and concentrate all power on it.  We quit our jobs to make this project become
true. This project will take one year and we will require funds for the
followings:
- Software: Purchases of licensed software for developers.
- Sound Designer: For better sound quality, we have to hire a Sound Designer to
work with us.

We choose
IndieGogo because we would like everyone to take a look at our project and be
the judge of whether "Dark Drive" should be created or not, and this is our main objective:"We will create enjoyable game which will make our players feel that it is
totally worth paying for."
"The Horizon... It is a gigantic fort in the space, 
built as a monumental symbol of power of
the mankind in the beginning of the 3rd Millennium 

and equipped with
assault machines and artificial intelligence able of developing weapons on
their own."
After the construction was
completed and before its first debut, The Horizon was taken over and completely
controlled by a Union’s agent from R.A.A. (Risk Against Agent) unit, the agent No.1 whose codename
is Nate.
The
pursue of Nate and The Horizon is difficult due to the fort’s special ability
to space jump and its omnipotent camouflage system. The Union will have to use extreme
measures in order to recapture The Horizon.
They
will do it, even if The Horizon may suffer some damages.
Besides
seizing The Horizon, Nate also took a hostage, who is the daughter of
R.A.A. agent No.21, codename Spik. Nate secretly contacted Spik and, without
any explanation, made a negotiation with Spik which requires him to travel to
The Horizon. 
Therefore,
Spik decided to travel to The Horizon to rescue his daughter, and to find out
the reason behind Nate’s action.
WeaponThere are two types of weapons in this game, Melee Weapon and Ranged
Weapon. Player can match their weapons of choice and can freely change weapons. 

Ranged Weapon 
Ranged
weapon can attack an enemy from further distance.   
Melee
Weapon ComboMelee
weapon can make combo freely.    
Drive
SystemDrive
System is a special attack that has limited usage from Melee Weapon.    
UpgradeMelee
weapon, Ranged weapon, Drive system and Combo will eventually get their own
upgrades through the story progress of the game, for the fun of finding out
"What's the next upgrade will we get?" Various Scenario
In
the adventure of finding the truth in "The Horizon," you'll be faced
with many scenarios that have different settings and put you in various
situations. Gameplay will vary and become more challenging.

EPIC
Boss Fight!!



Spik : R.A.A. No. 21Age : 30"Spik is a careful and strategic person. However, he is likely to act by his
own decision more than the organization’s rules. He has no mercy for anything
vicious." Mary : Spik's daughterAge : 9"Mary is an adopted child of Spik, yet he rarely has time for her. Her real
father is Demitry, a mafia godfather who was assassinated by Spik."Nate : R.A.A. No. 1Age : ??"Nate’s history is unknown. He is a genius with well-rounded
skills who became the first R.A.A. agent. No one has any idea of what made him
seize and take over The Horizon."
We
are determined to accomplish the project “Dark Drive” and have set Stretch Goal
in order to keep improving the quality of the game. When the fund allowance reaches
specific points, we will do as follows;55,000$ Extended Game Play!We
will make the game even more completed by adding alternate storyline, multiple endings
and secret upgrades to let player enjoy more exploration.70,000$ New game+We
will add a bigger challenge, New Game+ mode, which will add to the game’s
replayable value.100,000$ new weaponNew
Weapon! More Melee Weapons, Combos and Drive system to add more spice to the
gameplay.120,000$ TBA

story:
Mine for materials and craft orders as you race against the clock in Goblin Mines! Choose your demon, maximize it's stats during the summoning phase then take to the battlefield and fight through hordes of enemies in Demon Summoner! And more to come in the future...

Hello! My name is Steve Shannon and I'm an aspiring game developer! I've been working on this project since about March of 2018. Although I've been in game development for about 2 years, this will be the first game I finish and release, gaining valuable experience in the industry. 

Me and my friends are big fans of party games that can be played in local multiplayer and I'm excited to add to that genre. I have most of what I need for a fairly bare bones release, but I need funding to really do anything more. This game will be released regardless of funding, but with some extra money I can make it way better!

Honestly, I am not making this game for money. I spent a lot of my own money to get graphics and music going. I am making this game because I am passionate about video games and developing them. Any updates or additional content will likely be free. I appreciate it when game developers do that, and I want to reflect this behavior.

By donating, you can help make this game better for everyone. I would love to add many more mini games, and probably will in the future when I have more resources. This process will be expedited with your generous donations, directly translating to more content!

 

Stretch Goals:

  • $3,000 - Additional mini game featuring 3v1 asymmetrical PvP
  • $7,500 - A themed 3-pack of additional mini games

The majority of the funds go towards artwork. As it stands, about 70% of the costs are for graphics, 15% music and 15% sound effects. All donations would entirely pay for the rest of the project as well as any stretch goals if they are met.

Since the majority of this project is complete, the hardest work is behind me. What's left is polish and balance. If nothing else, I am very tenacious. I learned almost everything I know about game development on my own. I cannot foresee any challenge that I will prevent this game from happening.

 

If you are unable to donate but still want to support this project, you can share this page to other people and spread the word!

Thank you so much for stopping by and checking out this game!

story:
STONES OF SORROW is a cave painting action roguelike for PC, Mac and Linux. 

Download: STONES OF SORROW IndieGoGo alpha demo 0.1.2: 

STONES OF SORROW alpha demo 0.1.2



The game features historical cave paintings, action focused gameplay and violent executions.

Enjoy the great art and petroglyphs from Lascaux, Rochester to South Drakensberg brought to life in a video game. All the characters are painted tens of thousands of years ago by our forefathers.

Alpha Beta Gamer Review

Stone Meets Metal in Stones of Sorrow

Features:

  • Procedurally generated underground labyrinths. 
  • Action focused gameplay! Let the blood flow!
  • Graphics - gorgeous historical cave-paintings!
  • Every time you die you will get a little stronger. Use collected gold to buy perks for your next life!
  • Precise timing necessary to triumph in combat.
  • Hordes build up as time passes. Slaughter them all!
  • Items and perks of great mystery and power! Gain the edge and crush your enemies!
  • Savage executions!

Alpha Demo

Download  STONES OF SORROW IndieGoGo alpha demo 0.1.2:

http://www.indiedb.com/games/stones-of-sorrow/downloads/stonesofsorrowdemo-012

Full Xbox 360 controller support 

Vote on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=240042972

Although the game is in a playable state, it is still in early alpha and features only the bare bones of the future game. The game is still approximately 9 months away from completion and there are many missing features, animations and sounds.

The rough demo build contains only 1 level, 1 weapon, 4 enemy types, 3 different executions on one enemy, 6 stat changing items, a trader, a gatekeeper and lots of gore! Please enjoy!

The full game will contain at least 10 levels, 20 weapons, 15 brutal executions, 23 enemy types, 60 stat changing items, many different traders, EATING CORPSES Nethack style, weapon modifying and a story about a power struggle within an ancient  tribe. Your closest blood brother has betrayed you and tricked you into a cave labyrinth. It is up to you to restore your honour. In order to achieve that you must find the STONE OF SORROW and brutally crush his skull with it.

Stretch Goals

  • €4000 - Base Game. License fees.

    Unity Pro License. Anime Studio Pro license. IndieGoGo fees. 


About the developer

I'm Rain from Estonia and I'm a musician in an avant-garde brutal death metal band called NEOANDERTALS  http://neoandertals.bandcamp.com. My fascination with the Neanderthals, hominids and pre-written history introduced me to the wonderful cave-paintings of our ancestors. I thought those would look really awesome in a brutal videogame.

Exclusive T-Shirt

Risks And Challenges

A slight delay is possible if I discover that the final game needs more polish. But no more than a few months. 

Questions, suggestions, bugs?

stoneofsorrow@gmail.com

story:
The protagonist of the game is Phill Rand, a member of the police department, who by chance turns out to be dragged into a tangle of crimes, which he has to unravel for a rather long and branching storyline. Finding new clues and moving along the storyline, players will learn more and more new things both about the people around them and about their role in this dirty business. In addition to story missions, players can take calls on the police radio, performing optional instructions to maintain order in the city. Phill with his partner is free to move both on foot and on various machines that open in the course of promotion of the main character in the service.


Heart of The Nothing is exploring the world, exploration and secrecy. Become a detective: collect important evidence at the crime scene, interrogate witnesses using in-game objects, and bypass hostile environments using your sense of smell.

  • A rich, living and breathing world waiting to be explored. The Nothing takes place in post-cyberpunk, featuring real locations and breathtaking pixel landscapes.
  • A stylistic and thematic fusion of film noir, retrofuturism and dystopian classics. The world of The Nothing is something you’ve never seen before but always wished you had. 
  • Challenging, thought-provoking storyline featuring themes of power, corruption, social decay and systemic discrimination. The Nothing tells a tale about how our environment shapes us, and how we influence it in return.

  • Detective work. Collect evidence, interrogate witnesses, connect the dots and follow leads on your own. No hand-holding - move forward through the game by your own rules. Every case has numerous trails, and it’s up to you to decide which one to follow.
  • Special abilities. The Artifact is a unique ancient technology with unknown origins and purpose. If you learn how to use it, it might change the regular order or destroy it.

We have modelled our system requirements based off of the Unity engine recommended specifications. They are subject to change based on further development.

Desktop PC or Mac.

Windows 7 64-bit or Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later.

Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.

NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.

8 GB RAM.

story:
Welcome to the Dragon Maze crowd funding campaign

If you are reading this, first I want to thank you for taking some time to learn about this project. my name is Luis Garcia, best known as Lune and I have been working in mobile apps and games for 2 years under the name Feline Arts (demo reel here)

Also, I have been involved in several Talking Apps, outsourcing art for mobile games and recently released Phoenix Run for android, under Feline Arts name, now with more than 10,000 downloads after its release in 2012.

The reason of why we are doing this crowfunding campaign is because the studio funds itself with outsource works but this time we are agaist a deadline wich is the OUYA console release, so we can do 2 different things, get an outsource work, fund the game and miss the ouya deathline, or ask you for help to fund the project and finish this release. 

The Game

In dragon maze you play as a dragon who had his treasure stolen by the evil "Claw Gang", a vicious band of wolves, always searching for treasures to steal. Your goal is to claim your treasure back.

Target Platforms and Releases

The game will be released in several platforms, but the first one we have in mind is OUYA. Once the game is released for this android-based console, the second release will be for PC and MAC (within 2 weeks after the OUYA release) through steam greenlight.

As for last Android and iPad tablets, we still do not have an estimated date of release.

Characters

Dragon:

In Dragon Maze you play as this litle dragon, which has the unque habilities of rolling and dashing to smash things such as enemies or weak spots to discover secret areas around the world.

Also, you will be able to upgrade some skills to become stronger and retreive your treasure back from the evil "Claw Gang".

The Claw Gang:

These are the guys who took away your treasure while you were sleeping, they think a small dragon like you can't do anything to get it back. Of course they want your treasure to spend every coin in useless things.

 

Wallpaper size image here (1600x1200) (1920x1200)

The World

In Dragon Maze you will travel trough 6 different environments such as  forests, mountains, swamps, the wolf mines, the dangerous dragon volcano and a "yet to be revealed" location which will push your skills to the limit.

Also, you will find useful objects to aid you in your quest, upgrade your habilities and discover new areas. 

 

Development

Here you can see a comparison of the graphics in the alpha version and the graphics we are expecting for the final release, wich could still improve a bit more.

link to bigger images (image1) (image2)

 

Perks and Prizes

 here is a brief descritption of every item included in the perks

The "Dragon Maze's Development Journey" is an ebook of the problems and challenges we are facing with the development and how we worked around it, mostly aimed at people interested in starting a journey in game development or people who loves "behind the scenes" material,along with all the sketches and concept art made for the game.

 

Resource Allocation 

We need your help to raise 3500 usd to finish this game on time and this is how the resources will be allocated:

  • 1000 usd will be used to pay for music production
  • 2000 usd will be used to sustain the two developers during four months. this would actually be a payment of 250 usd per month per developer; it is only a parcial compensation for the work involved.
  • 300 usd will be used to print the perk posters and for the marketing campaign.
  • 200 usd will be the percentaje indiegogo and paypal takes for this campaign.
  • Extra income will be used to buy Unity plugins which will increase the visual effects quality in the game.

 

Stretch Goals

Stretch goals will be Voted by all the backers, we have some cool ideas for you to decide and vote.

 

The Team

Luis Garcia - Game Designer, Game Developer and 3d artist for 5 years, also involved as a 3D artist in different projects (samples at www.felinearts.net) outsource art for games, photorealistic visualizations, he also has been a digital arts instructor for 4 years.
(Linked in Profile)

Ivan Aldaz - Environment and GUI Artist for 3 years.
(Linked in Profile)

Carlos Flores - Involved in music for over a decade as composer, lyricist, singer and performer, founding member of the progressive metal band "Fahrenheit", producer and advisor for Muzeik Music Studio, with experience working on soundtrack production shoftfilm and games
(Linked in Profile)

 

Possible Dangers or Problems

the only possible danger is to have a delay in the release date but not more than two months. We will also submit this game to "Steam Greenlight" with the risk of having the game rejected. This does not affect your perk because you will be receiving a PC/Mac copy of the game anyway, but if we get into Steam Greenlight, you will get a free steam version too.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love the project and you can't contribute there is no problem, just help us to spread the word and that alone will help us reach our goal; the more people knows about our campaign, the closer we will be to achieve our goal!

Thanks for your time, and we hope you love Dragon Maze!

Also, you will be able to upgrade some skills to become stronger and retreive your treasure back from the evil "Claw Gang".

The Claw Gang:
These are the guys who took away your treasure while you were sleeping, they think a small dragon like you can't do anything to get it back. Of course they want your treasure to spend every coin in useless things.
 

Wallpaper size image here (1600x1200) (1920x1200)
The World
In Dragon Maze you will travel trough 6 different environments such as  forests, mountains, swamps, the wolf mines, the dangerous dragon volcano and a "yet to be revealed" location which will push your skills to the limit.

Also, you will find useful objects to aid you in your quest, upgrade your habilities and discover new areas. 
 
Development
Here you can see a comparison of the graphics in the alpha version and the graphics we are expecting for the final release, wich could still improve a bit more.

link to bigger images (image1) (image2)
 
Perks and Prizes
 here is a brief descritption of every item included in the perks
The "Dragon Maze's Development Journey" is an ebook of the problems and challenges we are facing with the development and how we worked around it, mostly aimed at people interested in starting a journey in game development or people who loves "behind the scenes" material,along with all the sketches and concept art made for the game.


 
Resource Allocation 
We need your help to raise 3500 usd to finish this game on time and this is how the resources will be allocated:

1000 usd will be used to pay for music production
2000 usd will be used to sustain the two developers during four months. this would actually be a payment of 250 usd per month per developer; it is only a parcial compensation for the work involved.
300 usd will be used to print the perk posters and for the marketing campaign.
200 usd will be the percentaje indiegogo and paypal takes for this campaign.
Extra income will be used to buy Unity plugins which will increase the visual effects quality in the game.

 
Stretch Goals
Stretch goals will be Voted by all the backers, we have some cool ideas for you to decide and vote.
 


The Team
Luis Garcia - Game Designer, Game Developer and 3d artist for 5 years, also involved as a 3D artist in different projects (samples at www.felinearts.net) outsource art for games, photorealistic visualizations, he also has been a digital arts instructor for 4 years.(Linked in Profile)
Ivan Aldaz - Environment and GUI Artist for 3 years.(Linked in Profile)
Carlos Flores - Involved in music for over a decade as composer, lyricist, singer and performer, founding member of the progressive metal band "Fahrenheit", producer and advisor for Muzeik Music Studio, with experience working on soundtrack production shoftfilm and games(Linked in Profile)
 
Possible Dangers or Problems
the only possible danger is to have a delay in the release date but not more than two months. We will also submit this game to "Steam Greenlight" with the risk of having the game rejected. This does not affect your perk because you will be receiving a PC/Mac copy of the game anyway, but if we get into Steam Greenlight, you will get a free steam version too.


Other Ways You Can Help
If you love the project and you can't contribute there is no problem, just help us to spread the word and that alone will help us reach our goal; the more people knows about our campaign, the closer we will be to achieve our goal!
Thanks for your time, and we hope you love Dragon Maze!

story:
Hello, ladies and gentlemen! I am Ismael Prieto! You probably know me, or at least heard of me.

Our company "Mystical World Miniatures" produces original fantasy and sci-fi bases from miniatures from size 2012, latest produces scenery for wargames, that can be found here:
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/MysticalWorldMiniatures/
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/598477390227986/
Offical Page: http://www.mysticalworldminiatures.com/


Today, we present the new line of resin miniatures of 35mm height at eyes sight. It was fun and toilsome. Now that we have finished these characters, we would like to continue design more models and pedestals for painters, collectors and players wishing to expand their display case with our models, which is why we need your help.

WHY THE NAME "DARK FANTASY & CREATURES"?

Besides being one of our favourite themes, this collection focuses on characters, creatures and rather dark legends.

Some characters are fantastic cut (Sorcerers, wizards and heroes in general) with a touch of symbols and more gothic-dark details.

Most of our creatures and monsters (vampires, werewolves, Undead...) are inspired by the mhyts and legends more known giving a slightly more updated approach.



We have than 10 models of miniatures for the campaign. The miniatures are designed in 35mm scale and are supplied with a base of PVC (unassembled). We are also considering the possibility of including a little personalised insert scenic base for each character


COMPARATIVE SIZE SCALE:




PRODUCTION:
Production will be made in high quality resin on a 35 mm scale. We’re certain of the finishing of each miniature, why resin is American will use high quality resin imported from USA. (Liquid Plastic)

Delivery time: approximately April 2016











Our intention is to offer the miniatures in this campaign at a reduced price and with a base of exposure only available to taxpayers. This base special edition can only be purchased through a specific Perk or unblocking the corresponding Goal strech with other miniatures after reaching the goal of 500 €.

Thanks to your help, we will achieve two things:
First, we can design over the next quarter between 8 and 10 models over a similar theme with mystical creatures large.
And second, you will help us expand the studio of Mystical World Miniatures as we are at a time of (improvement, expansion, reinvention)Currently, we have staff and machinery to manufacture vacuum and therefore only need 500 € for the minimum material means we initial mass production of these miniatures.

If we do not achieve the goal:
The project will be postponed to raise money, and taxpayers, Paypal, you will return the exact amount with which you have contributed.
If we achieve the goal:
We not only you will have helped achieve our dream, but also you will give us the opportunity to design new models. Of the total proceeds, between 8 and 10%, it goes to the Indiegogo and Paypal fees. Manufacturing costs, design and Packaging + shipping.*

*Please read more under the "SHIPPING" headline in the maind text of body.

Thanks to Indiegogo, we can offer models with a discount on the RRP everyone, So for the moment, and you take a cheaper miniature and being the first to get it. We have also adjusted the price of shipping everything we have and what the carrier allows for residents in Spain, the European community and the rest of the world.

SHIPPING COST:
(ENGLISH)
For residents in Spain the shipping costs are free attendence to the conditions post offers.
For non-residents in Spain we have also adjusted the price of shipping everything we have and what the carrier allows.

Spain: ...............Free Shipping
EU:........................................6€
Rest of the world:..............9€
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Anyone who has backed a Crowdfunding before is well aware of some of the biggest risks with backing a project. I, myself, have backed over different projects, and through that, I've got an insight on some of the difficulties with running a successful project. These risks are well considered and steps have been taken to attempt to minimize them:

1.) Delays
2.) Quality
3.) Communication

Delays
Let's be frank here; delays appear to be norm rather than the exception. The reason for this one can only speculate in, which I will not do. I will instead give you my take on delays for this specific project.

This project is focused around raising funds for creation and manufacturing miniatures, and because of this, there will be some risks involved with it. The risk comes from partners not being able to deliver on target. There are concept artists and illustrators, there are sculptors, there are casters, and then there are the different shipping companies. If one link in the chain breaks, it will obviously affect the rest.

However, these types of delays should not be a problem. The miniatures are sculpted and they have been cast in a number of copies already (7 of the 9/10 miniatures have been sculpted). The turn-around of this project should because of that be quite short for the first backers; and then shipping will go out in waves. Because of this I am confident that I will be able to meet the projected estimated delivery date for all backers!

Please be aware that none of the stretch goals are included in any of the sculpted miniatures. This means that if a stretch goal is reached a sculptor needs to be commissioned for it and then it needs to be sculpted. This could potentially mean delays simply because it being outsourced to third parties.

Quality
There are always some concerns regarding the quality of material used for casting. For this project, I have worked together with a skilled caster with extended knowledge of the casting process. The resin is of high quality, holds detail great and is sturdy (for being resin). However, like always when it concerns resin there will always be the risk of it breaking in transit. I will do my best to ensure the miniature is well-protected when sending it to you to reduce this risk.

Communication
I am dedicated to this project and will do my best to be reachable to answer any questions; both during and after the project ends. Of course, there will always be the risk that something unforeseen occurs on a personal level but as long as everything proceeds as expected, you can trust in easy and fast access to me with any and all your inquiries.

story:
Story is a very important part of our game. We are creating a unique post-apocalyptic setting by combining classical elements of this widely beloved genre with our vision of the nuclear wasteland of Australian desert. Our Outback is a lonely but deadly place, full of sand, cold rocks and despair. A place, that feels familiar, but at the same time completely alien.

 

 

After the year 1990 the history of mankind went a different way. Nobody knows where they came from, aliens, visitors from outer space. An advanced extraterrestrial race by the name of Quii. They came to earth in search for a shelter, after their homeworld was destroyed. They offered peace and advanced technology, but our leaders were too scared to lose their power. After a tragic sequence of failed negotiations a nuclear war broke out. Quii mothership was shot down and crushed to Earth, causing enormous damage, as a nuclear war on it’s own wasn’t enough. Humanity descended into stone age, civilization vanished.

Now the year is 2050. Humans and aliens have to fight together for the ultimate goal of survival on the ashes of the world.

 

We are creating an unparalleled mobile gaming experience by mixing 3 popular genres: Tower Defence, Tactical Shooter and RPG.

 

RPG

Character skills affect the gameplay.

You can go through one mission in many ways by changing squad's line-up and teammates’ inventories. Interactive dialogues introduce you to the main characters and the history of the Outback Defender world, and affect the game process. Your choices influence the skills, weapons and armor that characters obtain; unlock the secret missions and Easter eggs.

According to the stats character belongs to one of the 6 classes: Tank, Doctor, Sniper, Destroyer, Assassin, Scientist.

Pinkpunk and his mates have the following stats:

·        Intelligence

·        Strength

·        Agility

·        Luck

·        Special Skills

Every character uses all the items you put in his inventory differently. Rifle is almost useless for a Destroyer, but is a deadly weapon in the hands of a Sniper.

Tower Defense

In Outback Defender you can’t just run around the map and tap your enemies to death. Instead of being Mister Quick Fingers, you need to plan your attack, carefully choose your squaddies and set them on the special shooting points according to their class.

Each shooting point has its pros and cons. Character’s skills and stats affect efficiency of their shooting points.

Sniper feels quite comfy on a high spot, but Pinkpunk as a Tank would be totally helpless there. Once you put our pink-haired mate on the fortified position, he tears enemies apart. You can move the squaddies to the empty shooting points anytime.

Tactical shooter

If you want to survive in the Outback you have to think your tactics through. Move Pinkpunk and his mates to the best positions; study your enemies’ routs, behavior, and weak points. Evaluate your chances to hit, possible damage, and additional effects.

If you’re fighting radbits, headshot is your best option because it’s a guaranteed critical hit. Head of mads (a giant yellow ant) is covered with armor, so a direct hit to the head, however spectacular, will inflict very little damage. Unless you manage to injure mads’ jaw, decreasing the damage inflicted by his dreadful bite. Shooting cockatoo’s wing or gangama’s paws slows them down significantly. This could save Pinkpunk’s life one day, so pay attention!

 

 
Our goal is to develop a hardcore mobile game with a rapid and exciting gameplay that will keep players on their toes. In Outback Defender you don’t have to be a racer to win. You need to be smart. Build effective strategy, think tactics through, and use the following game mechanics to your advantage:
 

Game Active Pause (G.A.P.)

For Pinkpunk and his mates everything's moving really fast, but you don’t have to be as quick as lightning. Use game active pause (GAP) to slow your enemies down. This will give you enough time to relocate your squad, choose their targets and check the area for something useful, bombs for example.

Сhoice of aiming point

You can choose a body part of your enemy that you want to hit, shooting of a paw will slow enemies down, hitting the jaw will decrease damage, and a headshot will stop it for good. Every shot has a success probability that differs depending on the weapon you are using and character you are controlling.

Enemy’s weak points

Every enemy has its weak points, for example headshot for a radbit is a guaranteed critical hit, while shooting at the head of a Giant Yellow Ant — Mads would be almost senseless since it is covered with armour. As you play the game, you learn your enemy’s weak spots and feel your skills growing.

Mini-games

Sometimes Pinkpunk and his mates have to hack the computer or break a lock. In this wasted world there is no more private property! In reward they’ll get valuable item or additional information!

Variety of Missions

No rest for the wicked! Pinkpunk and his buddies won’t have time to relax. Easy ’just kill’em all‘ missions will give way to stealth missions and “Dodge the radioactive bull” missions, defense missions, fights with bosses and more.

Pinkpunk

A mysterious swagman. There is no verified information on where he came from. Roams the wastelands on his own, earns a living by selling loot. Cares only for himself, but a ruthless warrior is always a good mate when it comes to survival. His favorite song: Shoot to Thrill by AC/DC and he kinda’ doesn’t like birds. Well he actually freaking hates them!

Class: tank

Skills: close combat

Weapon of choice: shotgun

 

Mick

A sniper, born and raised in the Outback, but he can’t stand it. He actually hates everything, and trusts no one but his rifle. Claims that he never misses. Disregarding the

fact that he constantly complains about everything, he is  always a desired member of the team, in case you want to survive.

Class: sniper

Skills: enhanced aim

Weapon of choice: sniper rifle

 

Koarra

A Quii that was born on Earth, in the town called Alice Springs. Her father left them before she was even born and her mother perished in anti-Quii riots, that is still a usual thing in major cities. Koarra was adopted by local scientist known as Professor. He taught her all that he knew about Quii and their technology and told her about hoards that Quii made before the war. After professor died Koarra continued to search for alien treasures.

Class: Scientist

Skills: hacking

Weapon of choice: alien blaster

 

 

 

More the 50 years have passed since the Quii mothership crash landed on Earth, completely destroying the environment, spreading radioactive pollution and alien DNA all over the planet. Now the Outback is crawling with radioactive mutants, alien creatures and even crossbreeds of terrestrial and alien DNA. You can also expect violent gangsters, that have no respect for the human life and squads of mutated humans.


 

MOUNT MARY

It used to be small town by the road, but suffered heavy damage during the war. Expect packs of Atuu and ubiquitous radbits.

 

NEW ANTHILL OF THE ROCKY OUTBACK:

Mighty mads made tunnels in the rocks, some radbit’s holes were also reported here.

 

ROCKY OUTBACK

Typical landscape of the Outback, expect packs of radbits and probably some mads.

 

OASIS

This place might look like a piece of heaven comparing to the rest of the Outback. But trust us, this is very deceiving. Among other dangers here you can meet hundreds of cockatoos. Scavenger-cockatoos, beautiful and deadly. Kids like to come here to collect feathers. There are many blinded kids in a nearby town.

 

ABANDONED HOUSE

This house is so damaged that we can only guess, what was its purpose before. This might look like a nice place for a rest. What bad can happen?

 

THE BRIDGE

This Bridge is very important strategic point between territories of Dingo Gang and Mutants of the Balance. Sound’s like a lot of troubles, right? You wouldn’t go there, mate, would you?

 

 

Crazy Radbits Squad — is a union of wisdom of experienced Team Lead (11 years in Gamedev) and enthusiasm of young newbies. For some of us this is the first serious game project, but with help and support from Polygon and with wise guidance of our team lead we are more than ready to fulfill our goals. We visit additional courses, workshops, conferences, showcases and hackathons to gain experience and collect feedback. We fall asleep and we wake up with the name of Pinkpunk on our lips, we are incredibly determined to make a game that we all will be proud of, including you.

 


“I always loved games, since my childhood. Fallout is one of the first games, which I hung out for hours. Then I dreamed to create 3D cartoons. I am a developer and I have been making games for 11 years, 5 years of which in Unity. All this time, one way or another I worked on game design. And by the chance, I got into my first game development company and I realised that it was my mission”

“I have been working on games for 1,5 years. Most of all I like the genre of post-apocalypse, because it allows you to create an interesting and alternative world. We can review and even rewrite the history of places, things and peoples. We can tell people really cool stories. I associate myself with Koarra. She is independent, sarcastic and she can survive in “the world of men”

“Since my childhood I’ve loved video games, collected consoles and games for them. So, I decided to realise my childhood dream in adulthood — to develop games and be a part of this industry. I’m crazy about Australia and hardcore, so my favourite hero is Pinkpunk”

“My favourite fighter is an alien assassin, who isn’t in the game yet. He will be a really cool character, so I would like to play for him. I always dreamed to create virtual worlds. I looked for new opportunities and improved my skills. And now I just do what I really like — I create levels of the game for Outback”

“Before joining this project I mainly worked on hard surface models and environment models. So, it’s my first project where I work on characters. I love it, because I can prove myself, there is much more creativity than in hard surfaces. Especially I like monsters. As for me, I would like to play for Koarra, she is the only woman character in our setting! Glory to female power!”

“Our characters don’t have any prototypes — all ideas come to my mind. I have been creating concept for games only for 1,5 years, however I love games since my childhood. It can be said that I’m a fan of my job. And, of course, my favourite character is brutal and harsh Pinkpunk”

“I’m working on arts, UI-prototypes and a few characters’ concepts. I also create comics for the game. I like hardcore of Outback, post apocalypse and realistic graphics. And it so amazing that I would like to travel to Australia and cross the desert by myself”

 

Outback Defender came to life as a project at Polygon Game Lab. Polygon is an educational centre for gamedev and CG in Minsk, Belarus. It is a wonderful place where experienced professionals share their knowledge and skills with aspiring artists and developers. Polygon Game Lab is a place where creators can meet, form teams and initiate projects, best projects receive mentorship and support to reach a particular milestone. Outback defender happens to be the first project of PGL to reach its goal.

Within the last six months we have proven to be a wonderful team. Now we are Crazy Radbits Squad - a young studio, that is willing to write our name in history of gamedev with blood, sweat and tears.

We are raising money on Indiegogo to deliver the first chapter of the game. It will have up to 10 levels, with all our ideas implemented. With your help we will create assets we can use to expand the game, adding more chapters on a regular basis. We hope to achieve this within 3 months after the end of the campaign.


 

The funds will be used to support our team for the 3 months period. Polygon is providing us with office space and hardware, and as graduates of PGL we were presented with licenses for all necessary software.
