Being hardcore gamers ourselves with years of playing baggage, we’re trying to achieve something that would make us addicted - and we think we’re on the right track!
Gameplay

Subtera aims to be a different kind of MMO/RPG by modifying some if the core concepts seen nowadays in this genre:
Fast character creation and upgrading




The player does not need to spend months farming experience or grinding on the same mob forever. By leveraging the battles on less but much more powerful and deadly enemies the player is able to upgrade it’s perks with hours or days of play-through. Imagine a world where you are able to lose everything with a single mistake but in counterpart a character is able to achieve it’s full power in less time. We want to players to be engaged on the act of playing, not the act of doing repetitive tasks. This means that there is no experience bar; you’ll improve by doing the task you like more, and in counterpart will lose the skills you don’t use so much, without countless hours of grind or macroing.
No economy, less npcs
Well, this one is a bit ambitious but we want the game to be dynamic as it’s world. Do you want to buy a sword? Go to the forger guild and as a forger to do so! The forger does not have the required materials to forge the sword? Open a guild quest so adventurers can look for them! Found a dungeon while excavating for materials? Open a quest to let players know about it, and partner with them to (try to) clean it. Cleaned a dungeon? Call for all guilds to excavate and explore all the lore attached with all of them. The possibilities are infinite.
Having no economy means that items will be the currency in the game, and we’re going to provide a way to know what a item is being traded for, so people won't be scammed. We’re going to provide ways to  create valuable items like coins, so if the world end’s up with a currency, it will be developed by it and not just imposed upon.

"Building a furnace. Differently than normal crafting games the 3D format of the blocks will determine the resulting construction"Death
Death is a valuable commodity on subtera.
In a deadly world, death is inevitable, and interacting with it has to be unique, meaning that we have implemented a system that will be both interesting to new players and engaging for hardcore players. When you create a character, you have to create a testament binding: a god, guild and some quests will enable you to opt on what will happen when you die: do you want to lose your character stats but remain with your equipment? Bind your soul to Lord Debarthas, deity of possession. Want to risk everything and try a new character with completely random stats and equipment upon dying? Bind to Clev, the god of forbidden deeds, and try your luck. Each contract will give good and bad perks to your character, creating a unique environment and giving the sense of consequence to the player. The higher the contract is, the bigger is the power up and harsh is the payment. You chose!



Crafting and construction



We love sandbox games, and love what you can achieve by changing the world around you and tailoring it to resemble you, truly leaving a mark on it. We’re trying to create a sandbox game that’s at the same time beautiful and engaging. So differently from common sandbox games the process of construction/destruction is a bit slower than normal to ensure that people won’t break stuff freely and we don’t want to add magic stuff to prevent people from doing it. Note that enemies will be able to destroy the environment so prepare yourself for epic raids!

Intelligent AI

That’s one thing that bothers most of us: it seems that for the vast part of a MMO the mobs are there… to be killed. This is hurtful to the gameplay as the only motivation is to the player is:
A - kill thousands of enemies of X
B - Look for a new, stronger enemy and repeat
We want to break this never-ending chain of boringness by greatly improving the enemy AI. Expect that mobs work together for a goal, based on it’s preferences: expand the dungeon, loot cities and guilds, protect their environment and bosses. If a enemy has a pack behaviour, ALL enemies will turn against you (and will not attack one after the other, of course).
Non classification
We hate the idea of forcing a player to follow a specific path, hardening the choices as he/she progresses, so we’re removing the class system and leaving only the mastery tree: if you use a lot a set of items and do a lot of activities, you’ll be more effective on it, and thus creating your path on the way you desire. Of course improving a set of skills will set a drawback on another set of skills, so we wont have overpowered users.
Weapons and magic




As everything on subtera, the creating of weapons will be customizable. We’re going to develop an interface to the crafter that will enable the ability to customize, improve, paint and create new and unique items. This will enable a class of players/creators, which will have their creations valued on the entire game, instead of countless pre-factored weapons and infinite drops. We’re also planning to create a blender plugin to effectively enable the creation of new models by players and designers, thus creating brands for each player.
History
The world




Over the cycles the world had diverse names: Etreria on the far north in the peace era, Larth by the underlings after the greatest magic catastrophe, “The Minruir” by the great race of nomads, and many others only mentioned on bard tales; nowadays no one seems to bother in naming it, so scarce and depleted the civilization remnants are, being often called “The Land” for the upper parts of it and “Underland” for it’s depths.
Races
The slaves




There is evidence of the human race since almost the beginning of time, and since the beginning of time their main purpose was as labor force. No matter which race was dominant, humans were there to provide them with all sorts of tasks, be on the depths of the lava mines or fighting on wars just for it’s captives amusement. Since the last cataclysm which vanished the dominant races at approximately 100 cycles before most of them are free, roaming in small nomad groups, using their ability to adapt to almost all kinds of environments, situations and having excellent forging, crafting and weapon skills.
It’s rumored that a small gathering of humans is starting a new city  just below the surface on the far east...
Gears

The gears - the jocose name for the tall, human shaped mechanoids built in when the great race was thriving do not define their grandioseness; built to work with magic as it’s fuel, the Heighir are strong, robust and almost unbreakable. Once bound to a master and used as war machine, they’re now free, and having an infinite magic attunement capacity on it’s own they are starting to regroup on the ruins where their masters once ruled. Their power cores are extremely valuable as a magic source, but finding one, or destroying a gear to recover one is a task indented for the most fierce and talented ones. Many of the magic adepts try to get patronized by one gear, learning everything they can on the arcane ways. Usually a gear does not engage in battle, as it’s probably the end of a large portion of the world if they do.
The craven

Little is known about the craven’s origin. Some say that they were the by product of the ungodly experiments of Ir Malzam, the most famous dark manipulator of all times; some say that they are beings expelled by the most deep parts of the world, acting like growing tumors. The fact is, the cravens are beings of pure darkness, feeding from any living being that has the misfortune of crossing their path. Usually a craven does not kill it’s prey, messing with their emotions and even altering reality to extract the most of it’s fear. Once the victim is crazy, depleted of every possible emotion the craven then kills it and “borrows” what was most frigging, effectively becoming more dreadful and strong with each victim.
Just remember: where is darkness, there are cravens lurking on it. NEVER go outside on the dark. Ever.
Gods / Deities
Little is known about exactly what is a god or a deity on this feeble world. Some eras the mightiest champions were fabled as deities (and some even acted as one), some races worshiped the nature and their gods were the earth and the water and the animals, and some replied them, and yet some civilizations took the nature gods and bent they under magic and corruption.
DeitySome players, upon doing great deeds or achievements will be rewarded with a god blessing. This blessing, which will work for the character lifetime will grant a serie of bonuses and enable quests for the player and for other players that follow the god/are passing by. This will increase the quest dynamism and will offer great rewards for the most challenging quests.



What  we have now



We have functional prototype with the terrain engine, network and basic features working. 



Why We Need Your HelpWe are a small company. But our goal with this project is to make the game of our lives, not only as developers but also as players. Unfortunately to compete with the big games in the market is impossible without money, we need to hire artists and developers for the project be completed in acceptable time with high quality. We want to be part of something big.To accomplish this objective we have to dedicate our entire time to the project and contract many people we need money. Unfortunately we have a life.Costs:Our costs will be divided like this:Developers: 20%This amount is for our infantry. These guys makes the things happens, but they need to be well feed to keep fighting.Designers (20%)This amount is for our constructors. They will build our world. We need to provide the  resources these fellows  needs to make our world beautiful and growing.Support (10%)This amount is for our archers.These guys will defend our castles from attacks, will help you to solve your problems and correct any weakness we got.Marketing 10%This amount is for our carries. We need the people know us to our kingdom have power. To keep the thing running we need at least 1000 active players .  
Taxes (20%)
This amount is to our enemies. 
This is a great enemy in our land. They sabotage make we  spend much more money than we should.
Indiegogo (10%)
This amount is to our allies. 
Indiegogo is fighting our war and deserves share the glory.
Server/Maintenance (10%)
This amount is to maintain our castles
To maintain our war machine we need to pay for our supplies.
Risks & Challenges

Let's be frank - a mmo costs money. A LOT of money. We struggled to define a reasonable yet non frightening goal so we could at least have the chance to create something that is worth for the backer and can evolve on something stable for us to keep on the development and continuation of the game.
The Team
Besides working on the prototype for the latest 8 months, we're toying with games/consulting for quite some time (four years and counting), and released three games for Android and iOS using in house technologies like an open-source C++ 2D game engine (based on the famous libgdx engine) which runs the same game on all platforms  (and linux too!).
You can find more of us on our website


Other Ways You Can Help

 Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help: 
Share, share and share. Haven't you shared yet?
Be our publisher =) 
 And that's all there is to it.

story:
This page is dedicated to one of the tree models I created for the game table. It is a collapsible, full-color model, machine-cut from laminated card stock.

Unfolded, it measures approximately 4" wide and 5" tall. When flattened for storage or transportation, it measures about 4" by 7". My unique design was created for maximum convenience and portability; each piece can easily be set up for game play and flattened again for storage in a matter of seconds.

All surfaces are wet- and dry-erasable, and despite its light-weight design, it can support most metal figurines.

All pieces come ready to use, no painting or assembly is required. This particular piece features artwork that I commissioned from James Mosingo. I asked him to draw me a tree with a gothic/horror theme, and I was very happy with what he produced.

James is currently an art lead at IGT and Margaret Weis Productions, and an art designer at Konami. You can view more of his work here:

 http://www.mosingo.com/

story:
Hallo!


Als Android Wear vorgestellt wurde, haben wir die Wear-Funktion zu Lister hinzugefügt. Mittlerweile hat Google an den internen Funktionen von Android-Wear geschraubt. Wir müssen nun Änderungen vornehmen, sodass die Wear-Funktion in Zukunft funktioniert. Wir nehmen dies zum Anlass und bauen die Wear-Funktion von Grund auf neu.
Sie haben nun die Gelegenheit Ihre Wünsche für die kommende Wear-Funktion zu äußern. Was war an der momentanen Umsetzung gut? Was soll erhalten bleiben? Was hat gestört? Welche neuen Funktionen wünschen Sie sich? Passt das Layout? Soll jeweils nur ein Artikel sichtbar sein, oder mehrere, oder per Option wählbar?
Leider haben nur wenige eine Android-Wear Smartwatch. Aus diesem Grund ist der Neubau der Wear-Funktion weiter unten auf unserer To-do Liste. Unterstützen Sie die Entwicklung und wir werden die Wear-Funktion schnellstmöglich erneuern.
Für die Erneuerung setzen wir 5 Werktage Entwicklungszeit an. 1,5 Tage Wear-Dokumentation studieren, Demo-Projekte erstellen, 2 Tage Entwicklungszeit + Unit-Tests, 0,5 manuelles Testen, Dokumentation schreiben, 1 Tag Puffer. Ziel sind 1000 USD.
Bei Erreichen von 1500 USD stellen wir auch eine Funktion für die neuesten und gängigsten Samsung Smartwatches zur Verfügung.

Ihr Benjamin Glatzeder

story:
*Scroll down further to view a game intro video*


Short Summary:

Sneaky Bruno Games is the attempt of Patrick Gatdula (founder) to launch a hybrid game combining the best elements of an adventure game and the fun of trivia games. Through a rich story line with a varied cast of characters, the game is meant to exude happy and positive attitudes and designed to be intelligently entertaining.  The result of that effort is The Great Brain Adventure - A Trivia Game! for Android and iOS. Below are some features to expect:

  • A game with a heart and soul as told by the 4 main heroes who each have a profound lesson to share.
  • Effectively entertains and informs.
  • A trivia-adventure game with social gaming elements.
  • 4 playable and diverse characters - also represents 4 difficulty settings perfect for kids, teens or adults.
  • 32 villains to beat each representing a specific trivia topic (music, movies, math, science, history, geography, arts, etc).
  • Star collection system in order to unlock "trophies".
  • Driven by positive vibes through its art and music.
  • An expansive world for the player to explore - 16 worlds to discover.
  • Full length story - 4 introductions, 4 endings and even a 5th secret ending.
  • Powerups are available to help the player conquer the game.
  • Facebook connectivity so the player can share their result.
  • Various in game unlockables!
Sneaky Bruno Games is asking for your help to raise $35,000 to begin the programming phase of The Great Brain Adventure. $4200 of that amount are mandatory Indiegogo fees. Any excess will then be used to fund the game's marketing efforts.

Please continue to scroll down to see more details about The Great Brain Adventure mobile game and its developer, Sneaky Bruno Games. You can also visit www.sneakybrunogames.com or www.facebook.com/sneakybrunogames



Game Synopsis:

The Great Brain Adventure is a single player game that combines trivia and adventure game elements in a fast paced environment that ultimately rewards players with hours of entertainment through the game's story, music, characters and the game's trivia questions. It is driven by a heartwarming story and takes place in a colorful, funny, and a strangely familiar fictional world. It stars 4 heroes who have been transported to a foreign world and the player must help these characters fight their way back to Earth. The player's ultimate goal is to find and defeat the "Evil Scientist" who holds the knowledge to send the heroes back to their world but only after facing 32 antagonists, hundreds of stages and thousands of challenges.



Introduction Video:









Please continue to scroll down to see more details about The Great Brain Adventure mobile game and its developer, Sneaky Bruno Games. You can also visit www.sneakybrunogames.com or www.facebook.com/sneakybrunogames to learn more game details!


Our campaign will not succeed with out you! Thank you for supporting The Great Brain Adventure and please spread the word!



What We Need & What You Get

This campaign aims to raise funding to complete the game's Programming Phase - we hire a team of programmers to take our materials and code it to a working mobile game.

The Programming Phase will cost roughly about $25,000 to $30,000. That cost includes:

1. Programming Costs (4 month long production time).
2. IT support and maintenance for up to 6 months after launch.
3. App store set up and launch.
4. Game animations.
5. Guaranteed 100% execution of features listed in the game as specifically listed in detail by our game design documents.
6. Beta testing to ensure the game's maximum compatibility.

$4200 will go to Indiegogo - they charge 9% and another 3% for credit card processing

Any excess will help fund the game's execution phase*, marketing phase**, and upgrade phase***. These 3 phases are not part of this fund raising campaign.

*Execution Phase - when we make the game available for wide distribution for all to download and enjoy. It covers the cost of servers, app stores and other services.

**Marketing Phase - when we try to spread the word to as many people as possible about the game.

**Upgrade Phase - when we try to add features such as player to player trivia combat, character customization, and playable villains.



Standard Gifts Given According to Donation:

$5: Website Credit

  • Digital copy of the game.
  • Your name credited in our website.

$20: In Game Credit

  • Digital copy of the game.
  • Your name credited in our website.
  • Your name credited in the game's credits.

$40: All Characters + Unlimited Lives

  • Digital copy of the game.
  • Your name credited in our website.
  • Your name credited in the game's credits.
  • Get a special code made just for you that unlocks all characters and grants unlimited lives.

Special Gifts Given According to Donation:

$100: Basic Pack

  • Digital copy of the game.
  • Your name credited in our website.
  • Your name credited in the game's credits.
  • Get a special code made just for you that unlocks all characters and grants unlimited lives.
  • Get a special code that grants you 50 pieces of each of the game's power-ups.
  • You also get a game t-shirt!

$250: Team Villain Pack

  • 1x Game Poster
  • 1x Trucker Hat
  • 1x Tote / Beach Bag
  • 1x "Evil" Laser Pointer
  • 1x "Evil" 16GB Flash Drive
  • Everything mentioned in the Basic Pack

$300: Team Hero Pack

  • 1x Game Poster
  • 1x Trucker Hat
  • 1x Tote / Beach Bag
  • 1x Benjamin's Sunglasses
  • 1x Blossom's Scrunchy
  • 1x Bastet's Cat Toy
  • 1x Bruno's Dog Toy
  • Everything mentioned in the Basic Pack

$500: The 500 Club Pack

  • 1x Game Poster
  • 2x Trucker Hat
  • 2x Tote / Beach Bag
  • 1x Benjamin's Sunglasses
  • 1x Blossom's Scrunchy
  • 1x Bastet's Cat Toy
  • 1x Bruno's Dog Toy
  • 1x "Evil" Laser Pointer
  • 1x "Evil" 16GB Flash Drive
  • 1x Extra Game T-Shirt
  • Get a special code that grants you unlimited power-ups.
  • Everything mentioned in the Basic Pack

$1000: Male Villain Pack

  • You get to be permanently named after one of the game's 14 male villains.
  • Everything mentioned in the $500 Perk

$1000: Female Villain Pack

  • You get to be permanently named after one of the game's 7 female villains.
  • Everything mentioned in the $500 Perk

$2000: The Big Boss Pack

  • You get to be permanently named after the game's final and lead villain.
  • You also get a back pack.
  • Everything mentioned in the $500 Perk

Below are concept art of the various prizes offered as perks. Please check the "PERKS" section to see what combinations are available. The greater your donation, the greater the combination of free gifts!







About Sneaky Bruno Games

Hi everyone!  I've loved video games since my first try at Super Mario Brothers back in the glorious 80s. Since then, I've always thought that it would be a cool job to someday be involved in making video games. But one decision lead to another and as most stories go, we end up doing something different from what we once thought in doing. So one day, I told myself that I have to try and decided to start focusing on making my own games. But I didn't want just another game company that copied another company's blockbuster game. I wanted to be original and have a greater purpose. Shortly after, I founded an independent mobile game studio called "Sneaky Bruno Games" and decided that The Great Brain Adventure should be its first project. The Great Brain Adventure comes from a list of 8 game concepts.  I chose it simply because of the great potential that I see in its story, characters, and planned features. I truly believe that it is the perfect vehicle to begin my future as a game maker.

So I hope that what you have seen so far has gotten you excited and inspired to help me release my first game of many that I would love to make for all to play and enjoy. Thank you all in advance!

What I wrote here is actually quite compressed, there is more to learn by going to our website. It is also the best place to get the latest news and updates such as videos, photos and other media. I will be updating the website as the project moves forward: www.sneakybrunogames.com

We also have a Facebook page which I will also update as often as possible: www.facebook.com/sneakybrunogames

We also have a Twitter account under @SneakyBruno

If you need to contact me, here is my email:
patrick.gatdula@gmail.com

-Patrick Gatdula (Founder of Sneaky Bruno Games)

You also get a back pack.

Everything mentioned in the $500 Perk



Below are concept art of the various prizes offered as perks. Please check the "PERKS" section to see what combinations are available. The greater your donation, the greater the combination of free gifts! 









About Sneaky Bruno Games

Hi everyone!  I've loved video games since my first try at Super Mario Brothers back in the glorious 80s. Since then, I've always thought that it would be a cool job to someday be involved in making video games. But one decision lead to another and as most stories go, we end up doing something different from what we once thought in doing. So one day, I told myself that I have to try and decided to start focusing on making my own games. But I didn't want just another game company that copied another company's blockbuster game. I wanted to be original and have a greater purpose. Shortly after, I founded an independent mobile game studio called "Sneaky Bruno Games" and decided that The Great Brain Adventure should be its first project. The Great Brain Adventure comes from a list of 8 game concepts.  I chose it simply because of the great potential that I see in its story, characters, and planned features. I truly believe that it is the perfect vehicle to begin my future as a game maker. 
So I hope that what you have seen so far has gotten you excited and inspired to help me release my first game of many that I would love to make for all to play and enjoy. Thank you all in advance!
What I wrote here is actually quite compressed, there is more to learn by going to our website. It is also the best place to get the latest news and updates such as videos, photos and other media. I will be updating the website as the project moves forward: www.sneakybrunogames.com
We also have a Facebook page which I will also update as often as possible: www.facebook.com/sneakybrunogames
We also have a Twitter account under @SneakyBrunoIf you need to contact me, here is my email:patrick.gatdula@gmail.com
-Patrick Gatdula (Founder of Sneaky Bruno Games)

story:
Customized bases and bags for the board game Neuroshima Hex of Michal Oracz.

Choose an army and upgrade your game experience in this harsh post-apocalyptic world with Neuroshima Base and Bajosocial Productions. 


Bases y bolsa customizadas para el juego Neuroshima Hex de Michal Oracz.

Elije un ejército y mejora tu experiencia de juego en este duro mundo postapocalíptico gracias a Neuroshima Base y Bajosocial Productions.



1-  WHAT DO I OFFER?

     QUE ES LO QUE OFREZCO?


In this second project, Bajosocial Productions wants, with your help, customize the Neuroshima Hex board game.
The project is based on two main products:


En este su segundo proyecto Bajosocial Productions quiere, con vuestra ayuda, customizar el juego  de mesa Neuroshima Hex.

El proyecto consta de dos pilares:


  • The Neuroshima Bases:

Created with a hybrid process using the classic hand modeling  and 3D computer modeling and printing  and made of first quality polyurethane resin.

Each of the bases will be customized for each of the official armies of the game, with designs and chord symbols and colors for each faction.

These bases are created so that you can fit the headquarters tiles of each of the factions, giving your game more visual richness and making the differentiation of units easier, thus improving your gaming experience. Give your headquarters the importance it deserves!


  • Las Neuroshima Base:

Creadas con un proceso híbrido entre el modelado en 3D por ordenador y el modelado a mano y realizadas en resina de poliuretano tintada de primera calidad.

Cada una de las bases estará personalizadas para cada uno de los ejércitos oficiales del juego, con diseños acordes y con los símbolos y colores correspondientes a cada facción.

Estas bases están creadas para que se pueda encajar el hexágono de cuartel general de cada una de las facciones, dándole a tus partidas una mayor riqueza visual y facilitando la diferenciación de las unidades, mejorando así tu experiencia de juego. Dale a tu Cuartel general la importancia que merece!


  • The Neuroshima bags: 

Velvet bags of 10 x 12.5 cm, in the colors and with the printed symbols of each of the armies of the game.
With these bags you can store your armies more efficiently. All the bags being different makes the identification much easier when choosing army, and thanks to its locking mechanism all the pieces can be stored without risk of loss.
The  Neuroshima Bags also offer, due to their proper size, the possibility of drawing your tiles straight from the bag in each of your turns.


  • Las Neuroshima bags: 

Bolsas de terciopelo de 10 x 12.5 cm, de los colores y con los símbolos impresos de cada uno de los ejércitos del juego.

Con estas bolsas el jugador podrá almacenar sus facciones de una manera más eficiente. Al ser todas diferentes será mucho más fácil su identificación a la hora de elegir facción y gracias a su mecanismo de cierre todas las fichas podrán ser guardadas sin riesgo de pérdidas.

Las Neuroshima Bags ofrecen también, debido a su adecuado tamaño, la posibilidad de ser el lugar donde descansen nuestros hexágonos, pudiendo robarlos cada turno directamente de la bolsa




2-  WHAT ARE THE PACKS?

     CUALES SON LOS PACKS?


There are 5 packs alvailable:

Estos son los cinco packs disponibles:














3-  WHAT DO I NEED?

     QUE ES LO QUE NECESITO?


The goal I propose to raise is 1000€ (x backers + or -)
This is a low total that marks the limit I need to finish the remaining model bases and tokens, purchase the needed products (resins, silicones, dyes ...) and the corresponding bags in each color.
In this moment I have made ​​the 5 bases of basic box: 


La meta que propongo recaudar para que el proyecto se realice son 1000€ ( x backers + o - )

Esta es una cifra baja que marca el límite que necesito para poder acabar los modelos de las bases restantes y los contadores,  adquirir los productos ( Resinas, siliconas, tintes…) y las bolsas correspondientes en cada color.

Hasta este momento estan realizadas las 5 bases de la caja básica:




Now only 9 bases remain to have the 14 official game armies.
This first limit for the product is low, and leaves no profit margin for me, this has a reason; Bajosocial Productions is not a “normal” company, it is created by a fan of the games, and as a fan of the game the most important thing is to produce it, and share them with other players around the world.


Faltarian las 9 restantes para llegar al total de los 14 ejercitos oficiales del juego

Este primer límite para realizar los productos es bajo, y no deja margen de ganancia por mi parte, esto tiene una razón; Bajosocial Productions no es una empresa al uso, ha sido creada por un fan de los juegos de mesa, y como fan del juego que soy lo importante en primera estancia es llegar a producirlo y poder  así compartir estos complementos con otros jugadores alrededor del mundo.

* The Dancer army will have 3 bases.

* La faccion The Dancer tendra 3 bases.



4-  IS THIS ALL?

     ES ESTO TODO?


No, that´s not all... or at least I hope so.
Reaching the 1000€ target would already be a great pleasure for me, but to be able to make the most complete possible project, I seek your cooperation to make together something as large as possible.
And for that I propose different stretch goals


No, no es todo… o al menos eso espero.

Llegar a los 1000€ seria para mí una gran alegría, pero en mi meta de realizar el proyecto más completo posible busco vuestra colaboración para hacer de esto, entre todos, algo lo más grande posible.

Y para eso propongo diferentes escalones de recaudación para poder realizarlo.


If we arrive to 1500€ this stretch goal will add 12 wound tokens to your Neuroshima Basic Pack or Neuroshima complete pack, this tokens will be of black resin.

Si llegamos a la meta de 1500€ este escalón de recaudación añadirá 12 fichas de herida a tu Neuroshima Basic Pack o Neuroshima Complete pack, estas fichas estarán hechas de resina tintada en negro.


If we arrive to 2000€ this stretch goal will add 4 Vegas control tokens to your Neuroshima complete pack, this tokens will be of dark orange resin.


Si llegamos a la meta de 2000€ este escalón de recaudación añadirá 4 fichas de Vegas control a tu Neuroshima Complete pack, estas fichas estarán hechas de resina tintada en naranja oscuro.


If we arrive to 2500€ this stretch goal will add 1 Headquarter token for each different Neuroshima base in your Neuroshima Favorite Pack, Neuroshima Basic Pack or Neuroshima complete pack, each token will be of resin of the same color of their respective base.


Si llegamos a la meta de 2500€ este escalón de recaudación añadirá 1 fichas de cuartel general por cada base diferente en tu Neuroshima Favorite Pack, Neuroshima Basic Pack o Neuroshima Complete pack, estas fichas estarán hechas de resina tintada en el mismo color de su base respectiva.


If we arrive to 3000€ this stretch goal will add 6 net tokens to your Neuroshima Basic Pack or Neuroshima complete pack, this tokens will be of grey resin.


Si llegamos a la meta de 3000€ este escalón de recaudación añadirá 6 fichas de red a tu Neuroshima Basic Pack o Neuroshima Complete pack, estas fichas estarán hechas de resina tintada en gris.


If we arrive to 3500€ this stretch goal will add 4 paralisis tokens and 1 hole token to your Neuroshima complete pack, this tokens will be of greenish blue resin.


Si llegamos a la meta de 3500€ este escalón de recaudación añadirá 4 fichas de paralisis y 1 ficha de agujero a tu Neuroshima Complete pack, estas fichas estarán hechas de resina tintada en azul verdoso.


If we arrive to 4000€ this stretch goal will add 1 net of steel token to your Neuroshima complete pack, this token will be bigger than the net tokens and made of grey resin.

Si llegamos a la meta de 4000€ este escalón de recaudación añadirá 1 ficha de red de acero a tu Neuroshima Complete pack, esta ficha sera más grande que las fichas de red normales y estará hecha de resina tintada en gris.


If we arrive to 4500€ this stretch goal adds 1 velvet bag  to your Neuroshima Basic Pack or Neuroshima complete pack.

Si llegamos a la meta de 4500€ este escalón de recaudación añadirá 1 bolsa de terciopelo a tu Neuroshima Basic Pack o Neuroshima Complete pack.


If we arrive to 5000€ this stretch goal will add 5 poison tokens to your Neuroshima complete pack, this tokens will be of black resin.

Si llegamos a la meta de 5000€ este escalón de recaudación añadirá 5 fichas de veneno a tu Neuroshima Complete pack, estas fichas estarán hechas de resina tintada en negro.


If we arrive to 5500€ this stretch goal will add 1 Toxic bomb token to your Neuroshima complete pack, this tokens will be of beige resin.

Si llegamos a la meta de 5500€ este escalón de recaudación añadirá 1 ficha de bomba toxica a tu Neuroshima Complete pack, esta ficha estará hecha de resina tintada en beige.


If we arrive to 6000€ this last stretch goal will add 1 next comming Uranum Miners base with his respective Headquarters token to your Neuroshima complete pack, this pieces will be of grey resin ( or the colour chossen by Portal Games)

Si llegamos a la meta de 6000€ este último escalón de recaudación añadirá 1 base del próximo ejercito que van a sacar a la luz; Uranum Miners, y vendrá con su respectiva ficha de cuartel general en tu Neuroshima Complete pack, estas fichas estarán hechas de resina tintada en gris ( o del color elegido por Portal Games).


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If we arrive to the last stretch goal, all of this we be the products in your packs.

Si llegamos al ultimo escalón de recaudación todos estos serán los productos que obtendreis en vuestros packs.



Reaching these stretch goals doesn´t depend only on me, you can help a lot sharing the project on boardgames pages and blogs, and on Facebook and twitter too! Let´s do the more complete project with your help!


Llegar a estas metas de recaudación no solo depende de mi, tu tambien puedes ayudar mucho compartiendo el proyecto en paginas de juegos de mesa, blogs y en Facebook y Twitter! Llegemos a hacer el proyecto más completo posible con tu ayuda!






5-  AND A LITTLE MORE...

     Y UN POCO MAS...



To thank you for your cooperation and also to keep you informed of the project's processes, I´d like to ask you to give one like on the facebook page of Bajosocial Productions.

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Bajosocial-Productions/523230007709099?ref=stream

All backers that give a like on Facebook, will receive an exclusive velvet bag with the symbols of Neuroshima hex and Bajosocial Productions, that you can use to save all tokens unlocked with the stretch goals. (Only for the Neuroshima Basic Pack and Neuroshima Complete Pack)


Con el fin de agradecer vuestra colaboración y a la vez manteneros informados de los procesos del  proyecto, os pido que le deis un like a la página de facebook de Bajosocial Productions.

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Bajosocial-Productions/523230007709099?ref=stream

Todos los backers que den un like recibirán una exclusiva bolsa de terciopelo con los simbolos de neuroshima hex y Bajosocial Productions, que podréis utilizar para guardar todos los marcadores que se vayan revelando con los stretch goals. (Solo para los Neuroshima Basic Pack y Neuroshima Complete Pack)


And for the fans of the game, Bajosocial Productions recommends you take a look at the web site of his official partner; http://neuroshimahex.pl/

Page about the game with daily updates and lots of articles about the Neuroshima hex world, you can also follow them on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/neuroshimahexpl?fref=nf


Y para los fans del juego, Bajosocial Productions recomienda que echeis un vistazo a la pagina de su colaborador oficial: http://neuroshimahex.pl/

Aqui encontrareis actualizaciones diarias y una gran cantidad de articulos sobre el mundo de Neuroshima Hex, tambien puedes seguirlos en Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/neuroshimahexpl?fref=nf





6-  CLARIFICATIONS.

     AVISOS.


Bajosocial productions and its products are in no way related, affiliated, supported, or in agreement with Michal Oracz, Neuroshima Hex, or any of its distributors.

Symbols and images of the game are used with the consent of the creators of the game
It is the backer of the Bajosocial Productions product that has the responsibility to use the product for what it is; pieces to use with the original ones that the game has, assuming that the backer has a complete original copy of the game or wants the customized pieces as collector's items or for exposition.


Bajosocial productions y sus productos no están de ninguna manera afiliados, relacionados, con el apoyo, o de acuerdo con Michael Oracz, Neuroshima Hex o alguno de sus distribuidores.

Los símbolos e imagenes del juego han sido utilizadas con el consentimiento de los creadores del juego.

Es el comprador del producto de Bajosocial Productions el que tiene la responsabilidad de usar el producto como lo que es, unas fichas para poder usarlas con las originales que tiene el juego, dando por hecho que este tiene una copia completa original del mismo o que las quiere como objeto de coleccionista o para exposición.




7-  RISKS AND CHALLENGES.

     RIESGOS Y DESAFIOS.


This is the second crowfounding project for Bajosocial Productions.

To this day, thanks to the experience gained from the success of our first project:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/ancient-civilizations-cities-settlements/x/3930238

Bajosocial Productions is fully prepared to carry out another project on the same scale, we had delays in shippments in our first project, but learned from our mistakes to make sure we do not repeat them.

To improve this issue, deliveries will be phased over several months, but giving each backer a much more approximated date of expected delivery, depending on his order number on the order list.


Orders between 0 - 2500€ : shipping date December,10.

Orders between 2500€ - 5000€: shipping date January,10

Orders between 5000€ - 7500€: shipping date February,10

Orders between 7500€ - 10.000€: shipping date March, 10


Este es el segundo proyecto de crowfounding para Bajosocial Productions.

A dia de hoy y gracias a la experiencia ganada tras el exito de nuestro primer proyecto:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/ancient-civilizations-cities-settlements/x/3930238

Bajosocial Productions está plenamente preparado para llevar a cabo otro proyecto de la misma escala, tuvimos retrasos en los envios en el primer proyecto, pero aprendimos de esos errores para asegurarnos que no se repitan.

Para asegurarnos de ello los envios se llevaran a cabo durante varios meses, pero dando a cada mecenas una fecha de envio mucho mas aproximada, dependiendo de su orden de pedido dentro la siguiente tabla.


Ordenes entre 0 - 2500€: fecha de envio 10 de Diciembre

Ordenes entre 2500€ - 5000€: fecha de envio 10 de Enero

Ordenes entre 5000€ - 7500€: fecha de envio 10 de Febrero

Ordenes entre 7500€ - 10.000€: fecha de envio 10 de Marzo

Y para los fans del juego, Bajosocial Productions recomienda que echeis un vistazo a la pagina de su colaborador oficial: http://neuroshimahex.pl/Aqui encontrareis actualizaciones diarias y una gran cantidad de articulos sobre el mundo de Neuroshima Hex, tambien puedes seguirlos en Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/neuroshimahexpl?fref=nf

6-  CLARIFICATIONS.      AVISOS.

Bajosocial productions and its
products are in no way related, affiliated, supported, or in agreement with Michal
Oracz, Neuroshima Hex, or any of its distributors.
Symbols and images of the game
are used with the consent of the creators of the game
It is the backer of the Bajosocial Productions product that has the
responsibility to use the product for what it is; pieces to use with the
original ones that the game has, assuming that the backer has a complete
original copy of the game or wants the customized pieces as collector's items
or for exposition.
Bajosocial
 productions y sus productos no están de ninguna manera afiliados, 
relacionados, con el apoyo, o de acuerdo con Michael Oracz, Neuroshima Hex o alguno de sus distribuidores.
Los símbolos e imagenes del juego han sido utilizadas con el consentimiento de los creadores del juego.
Es el comprador del producto de Bajosocial Productions el que tiene 
la responsabilidad de usar el producto como lo que es, unas fichas para 
poder usarlas con las originales que tiene el juego, dando por 
hecho que este tiene una copia completa original del mismo o que las 
quiere como objeto de coleccionista o para exposición.




7-  RISKS AND CHALLENGES. 
     RIESGOS Y DESAFIOS.

This is the second crowfounding project for Bajosocial Productions.To this day, thanks to the experience gained from the success of our first project:https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/ancient-civilizations-cities-settlements/x/3930238Bajosocial Productions is fully prepared to carry out another project on the same scale, we had delays in shippments in our first project, but learned from our mistakes to make sure we do not repeat them.To improve this issue, deliveries will be phased over several months, but giving each backer a much more approximated date of expected delivery, depending on his order number on the order list.Orders between 0 - 2500€ : shipping date December,10.Orders between 2500€ - 5000€: shipping date January,10Orders between 5000€ - 7500€: shipping date February,10Orders between 7500€ - 10.000€: shipping date March, 10Este es el segundo proyecto de crowfounding para Bajosocial Productions.A dia de hoy y gracias a la experiencia ganada tras el exito de nuestro primer proyecto:https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/ancient-civilizations-cities-settlements/x/3930238Bajosocial Productions está plenamente preparado para llevar a cabo otro proyecto de la misma escala, tuvimos retrasos en los envios en el primer proyecto, pero aprendimos de esos errores para asegurarnos que no se repitan.Para asegurarnos de ello los envios se llevaran a cabo durante varios meses, pero dando a cada mecenas una fecha de envio mucho mas aproximada, dependiendo de su orden de pedido dentro la siguiente tabla.Ordenes entre 0 - 2500€: fecha de envio 10 de DiciembreOrdenes entre 2500€ - 5000€: fecha de envio 10 de EneroOrdenes entre 5000€ - 7500€: fecha de envio 10 de FebreroOrdenes entre 7500€ - 10.000€: fecha de envio 10 de Marzo

story:
Legendary Battlegrounds

INICIO / HOME

SOBRE NOSOTROS/ ABOUT US

¿POR QUÉ RECURRIR A UNA CAMPAÑA DE CROWDFUNDING?/ WHY USE THE CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN

EL TABLERO/ THE BOARD

LAS RECOMPENSAS / REWARDS

CONDICIONES Y GASTOS DE ENVÍO / TERMS AND SHIPPING COST

RECOMPENSAS DESBLOQUEABLES / UNLOCKABLE REWARDS

FUTUROS LANZAMIENTOS / FUTURE RELEASES


  • INICIO/HOME

Vamos al grano!  Necesitamos ayuda para comercializar un proyecto consistente en un tablero de juego modular a escala 28/30mm. El tablero de juego es ideal para crear el ambiente perfecto en tus juegos de escaramuzas, partidas de rol o simplemente construir un diorama.

My apologies for my bad English. Getting down to business! We require investors to help us market our project, consisting of a modular board game, 28/30mm scale. The board game is ideal for creating the perfect environment in your skirmish games, role playing or just build a diorama.

El concepto de este tablero de juego modular consiste en: módulos rectangulares  independientes de 16” por 16” pulgadas (40,6 x40,6cm) que pueden unirse entre si a modo de puzzle encajando perfectamente  en cualquier posición que desees, creando en conjunto la superficie de una ciudad, aldea o pueblo medieval, dando el ambiente perfecto para una partida de rol o un juego de escaramuzas tipo Mordheim, 1650 A capa y espada, Carnevale , Malifaux… o incluso para una batalla de cualquier wargame tipo Warhammer, Warthrone of Saga, Warlord, Kings of War, etc

The concept of this modular board game comprises: of separate rectangular modules 16" by 16" inches (40,6 x 40.6cm). The boards can fit together like a puzzle, fitting perfectly in any desired position, creating an area of a city, town or medieval village, providing the perfect setting for a role or skirmish game as Mordheim , 1650 a capa y espada, Carnevale, Malifaux ... or even for a battle of any war game such as Warhammer, Warthrone of Saga, Warlord, Kings of War, etc.

  • SOBRE NOSOTROS/ ABOUT US

El principal responsable del proyecto es Víctor, ingeniero de treinta y tantos años, aficionado desde hace muchos años a los wargames y  juegos de rol, al que le encanta pintar miniaturas y crear elementos de escenografía. 

The project leader, Victor, is an engineer in his thirties and a fan for many years of war games and RPGs, who loves painting miniatures and creating elements of scenery.

Miniature Battlegrounds es una pequeña empresa con grandes aspiraciones y se ha lanzado de cabeza a crear escenografía espectacular y barata para nuestros juegos. “Creemos que nuestro producto es interesante y  va a gustar, por eso ya hemos empezado a trabajar en la fabricación de los módulos del tablero y ese es el motivo de que la cantidad económica solicitada no sea muy elevada. Con esta campaña de financiación en masa pretendemos recaudar algunos fondos para los duros inicios y sobre todo ver la aceptación del producto entre los aficionados.”

MiniatureBattlegrounds is a small company with big aspirations and has already started creatinga series of spectacular sceneriesat affordable prices. "We believe that our product will be of interest, so we have already started production of the modules for the board and that is the reason, the request for financial investment is not very high. With Crowdfunding Campaign we hope to raise enough funds for the tough beginnings and especially to see the product accepted among fans. "

Podéis obtener más información en nuestra web. You can get more information on our website

Legendary Battlegrounds


  • ¿POR QUÉ RECURRIR A UNA CAMPAÑA DE CROWDFUNDING? / WHY USE A CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN?

Creemos que este método de financiación es ideal para nosotros. Pretendemos darnos a conocer entre los aficionados de todo el mundo y además solicitar vuestra ayuda para poder financiarnos durante los primeros meses de trabajo. Confiamos en que el proyecto guste a los jugadores y por eso ya hemos empezado a fabricar la mayoría de los módulos del tablero invirtiendo nuestros propios ahorros.

We believe this method of financing is ideal for us. We aim to be known to our fans around the world and also request your help to fund us for the first months work. Confident that the players willlike the project and so we have begun to make the majority of the board modules investing our own savings.


  • EL TABLERO / THE BOARD

Vayamos a lo que realmente nos interesa. Let's get down to what really interests us.

Toda la escenografía es creada a mano, utilizando siempre materiales que representen la realidad lo mejor posible. La superficie del tablero es de escayola de alta resistencia a la compresión. Casi 500kg/cm2, aproximadamente 16 veces superior a la resistencia de la escayola convencional y con un mejor acabado para obtener el mayor nivel de detalle posible.  Además hemos añadido una capa de aglomerado para dar rigidez al conjunto y otra capa de poliexpan de alta densidad para poder dar volumen y conseguir diferentes niveles en el tablero. 

All the scenery is created by hand, using materials that represent reality at it’s best. The material chosen for the board surface is plaster. But not just any ordinary plaster, after our research we have chosen high compressive strength plaster as it is tougher and provides a better finish for the highest level of detail possible. Almost 500kg/cm2, about 16 times the strength of conventional plaster.

Primer módulo original /First original module

Como podéis ver en las imágenes, los típicos edificios de las colecciones de escenografía de cualquier jugador encajan perfectamente sobre el tablero y el resultado que se obtiene es espectacular. Para mostraros el resultado, se han utilizado elementos de escenografía de las marcas Tabletop World, Games Workshop y edificios creados con los moldes Hirst Arts Fantasy Architecture Inc. Si el proyecto sale adelante, ya estamos pensando en la creación de nuestra propia gama de edificios.

As you can see from the pictures, the typical buildings and scenery collections of any player fit perfectly onto the board and the result you get is spectacular. To show the result, we used elements of scenery brandslike Tabletop World, Games Workshop and buildings created with moulds from Hirst Arts Fantasy Architecture Inc. If the project goes ahead, we are thinking about creating our own range of buildings.


Estas son las imágenes del prototipo del tablero. These are the images of the prototype board.

El diseño definitivo se ha mejorado, se han adaptado las medidas de los módulos a las dimensiones estándar de las mesas de juego y se ha rediseñado completamente la superficie del tablero.

The final design has been improved and adapted the module size to the standard dimensions of the gaming tables, and completely redesigned the board surface.

Módulo Básico / Basic Module

Primer módulo original /First original module

Nota: Para el diseño definitivo No se han utilizado moldes o piezas diseñadas por otras marcas.

Note: For the final design we have NOT used moulds or pieces designed by other brands.

Durante el último año he realizado la dura labor de jugar montones de partidas junto a mi equipo de playtester y el resultado ha sido genial. Hemos jugado un mínimo de una partida semanal y no hemos llegado a jugar dos partidas iguales gracias a las inmensas posibilidades que ofrece el tablero modular. Además el tablero ha resistido perfectamente el maltrato de los jugadores más entusiastas  y no ha sufrido graves desperfectos en todo este tiempo de uso.

During the last year I have tested the boardby playing lots of games with my team of playtester and the results have been great. We have played at least a game every week and we have not played two games the same thanks to the immense potential of the modular board. In addition, the board has stood up to the mistreatment of enthusiastic players and is still in excellent condition after all oftheusage it has had.

Podéis ver más imágenes y videos del tablero en nuestra pagina web

You can see more pictures and videos of board on our website.

Legendary Battlegrounds

  • LAS RECOMPENSAS / REWARDS

El tablero de juego Legendary Battlegrounds es GRANDE, y esto es un problema para los gastos de envío. The Legendary Battlegrounds board game is BIG, and this is a problem for shipping cost.

Hemos creado 3 categorías  para las recompensas. Ligeras, Pesadas y Legendarias. We created three categories for rewards. Light, Heavy and Legendary

Light Supports /Apoyos Ligeros. El peso de las recompensas será menor de 10kg. The weight of the rewards will be less than 10kg

Heavy Support /Apoyos Pesados. El peso de las recompensas será mayor de 10kg. The weight of the rewards will be greater than 10kg

Legendary Rewards /Recompensas Legendarias. El peso de las recompensas Legendarias será mayor de 10kg y son artículos totalmente pintados por nuestro equipo.  The weight of the rewards will be greater than 10kg and they are fully painted by our team.


Módulos Básicos y Especiales/ Basic and Special Modules

Los módulos básicos representan calles, aceras y zonas corrientes de una ciudad. The basic modules represent streets, sidewalks and common areas of a city.

Los módulos especiales son mas elaborados y representan zonas importantes como una plaza, o una zona elevada de la ciudad. 

The special modules are more elaborate and represent important areas like a square, or a raised area of the city.

Módulo Especial "Plaza" / Special Module "Square"



  • CONDICIONES Y GASTOS DE ENVÍO / TERMS AND SHIPPING COST

Este va a ser uno de nuestros mayores hándicap y haremos todo lo posible por salvarlo, costeando parte de los gastos de envío que supone trasportar el voluminoso tablero.

Para recibir las recompensas deberéis sumar a vuestra contribución económica el coste de los gastos de envío según las indicaciones de la siguiente tabla. Excepto para España peninsular, donde los gastos de envío son GRATIS.

We will do our very best to source the cheapest transport companies to maintain the lowest shipping costs at all times.

Below is the list of the shipping costs. Please add the shipping costs to your contribution.

Gastos de envío con IVA incluido / Shipping costs with taxes included


Nota importante. Si tu país no aparece en la lista, por favor ponte en contacto con nosotros y gustosamente te enviaremos un presupuesto de tus gastos de envío.

Important. If your country is not listed, please contact us and we will send you an estimate of your shipping charges.

Email: victor@legendarybattlegrounds.com


En cuanto finalice el plazo de la campaña empezaremos a enviar las recompensas. En función de la demanda estimamos que el plazo para recibir todos las recompensas puede ser de 2 meses después de finalizar la campaña. Haremos todo lo posible por que lleguen antes de la campaña de navidad.

When the crowdfunding campaign ends we start sending the rewards. Depending on demand we estimate that you shall receive the reward in two months after the campaign ended. We will make every effort to arrive before the Christmas season.


  • RECOMPENSAS DESBLOQUEABLES / UNLOCKABLE REWARDS
Si alcanzamos determinadas cantidades económicas podremos ampliar la gama de módulos disponibles, hasta conseguir completar un tablero Legendario. If we raise enough funds we can expand the range of available modules and we get a Legendary board.

6.000€ Crearemos un nuevo modulo especial a elegir / We will create a new special module, it will be able to choose.

10.000€ Crearemos un nuevo modulo LEGENDARIO, "El Río" / We will create a new LEGENDARY module, "The River".

15.000€ ¿?¿?¿?

 

  • FUTUROS LANZAMIENTOS / FUTURE RELEASES

Ya tenemos pensado ampliar el tablero. En función de la aceptación del producto entre los aficionados hemos pensado posibles ampliaciones para el tablero.

We already have plans to expand the board. Depending on the product acceptance by the fans.

Conjunto de 3 tableros que unidos formen una sección de río con sus correspondientes puentes, embarcaderos, etc. Set of three boards that together form a river section with corresponding bridges, piers, etc.

Nuestra propia gama de edificios para completar el tablero . Our own range of buildings to complete the board.

Toda una serie de nuevos tableros modulares que formen un Dungeon completo.  De tal manera que con los 2 tableros podrás representar la ciudad y todos los pasadizos y cámaras secretas del subterráneo. A whole new series of modular panels that form a complete Dungeon. So that the 2 boards can represent the city and all of the secret passages and underground chambers.


Esto va a ser legen... espera... dario / It will be legen... wait for it... dary


Para cualquier duda escribir al siguiente email. For any questions you can write to the following email

Email: victor@legendarybattlegrounds.com
